* Analyse global markets and clients' situations to recommend appropriate financial products and services.
* Advise on a comprehensive range of products, including Lump Sum Investments, Fixed-Income Products, Global Funds (including Equity, VC, ESG), Regular Savings Plans, Portfolio Bonds, International Pension Planning, and Fintech solutions.
* Stay informed and comply with all relevant legislative, financial, procedural, and quality requirements.



  





**About You** 




 This position is ideal for experienced and qualified IFA candidates looking for a client-facing, sales-driven role within the international financial sales profession. It is not suited for those in accounting, auditing, or financial management roles.
 



  





**Skills Required** 



* Service-focused with strong numerical and analytical skills.
* Experience in managing high-net-worth clients is desirable.
* Knowledge of lump sum investments, offshore investments, fintech, bonds, or pension products is highly advantageous.
* A trustworthy, financially sound, professional team player with a commitment to delivering top-quality service.
* Strong judgment skills and attention to detail.
* A proven sales track record is advantageous but not essential.
* Ambitious, success-driven, and motivated by targets.



  





**Company Benefits** 



* Opportunities for further chartered qualifications relevant to the industry.
* Multitude of career opportunities and progression.
* Opportunity to transfer to different locations.
* Competitive commission bonus based on a transparent structure.
* Individual and team training that supports your development.
* Client and employee events.



  





**Join Us** 




 Transitioning into the international advisory market isn't as difficult as one might imagine. Take the first step and inquire today. Your future with deVere awaits.

title: Microsoft Lösningsarkitekt till Knowit i Stockholm
description:
För att fortsätta skapa bättre beslutstöd och effektivare organisationer inom både privat- och offentlig sektor söker vi dig som, likt oss, förstått styrkan i data. Hos oss får du arbeta med passionerade kollegor och kunder i strävan att skapa en bättre och mer hållbar framtid genom innovativa analytics lösningar.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig:**
* En central och verksamhetskritisk roll där du arbetar med det senaste inom Microsoft ekosystem.
* En kreativ och stöttande arbetsmiljö med fokus på personlig och professionell utveckling.
* Konkurrenskraftigt förmånspaket med försäkring, pension, årsbonus och flexibla arbetstider.


**Om rollen och ditt team:**
 Hos knowit Datalytics i Stockholm blir du en del av ett team om 50 skickliga specialister inom analytics och data management. Vi har en decentraliserad organisationsstruktur med snabba beslutsvägar, samtidigt som vi har kraften av en stor organisation med 4400 erfarna specialister i Sverige och Norden.
   

  

 I din roll som Microsoft lösningsarkitekt arbetar du inom hela erbjudande- och leveranskedjan av analytics- och datamanagementlösningar till våra kunder, vilket bland annat innebär:
   

  

* Strategisk rådgivning, arkitektur och teknisk vägledning utifrån kundens behov.
* Designa, utveckla och implementera analytics- och datamangementlösningar enligt föreslagen arkitektur.
* Översätta behov till hållbara lösningar med kvalité och efterlevnad av IT- och säkerhetsföreskrifter


**Om dig:**
 För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har ett antal års erfarenhet inom rollen som lösningsarkitekt med erfarenhet av Microsoft data management produkter och tjänster, både onprem och i molnet. Vidare har du en teknisk bredd inom ETL och Data warehouse med ett intresse att arbeta nära tekniken.
   

  

 Som konsult har du en förmåga att samarbeta och anpassa din kommunikation för att förklara komplexa lösningar på olika nivåer. Du är lyhörd för behov, förutsättningar och möjligheter och kan omsätta dessa till tydliga mål och en effektiv leverans. Du är flytande i svenska och engelska.

title: Engineering Manager - Snap Store & Charmhub
description:
This is a technical management role to lead a team that develops Python and Golang micro-services that power our global software distribution engine. The world sees it as the Snap Store and Charmhub.io marketplaces, behind the scenes it is a unified system that understands key concepts in software distribution - architectures, releases, betas, release candidates, stable releases, branches and more. We are on a journey to transform the experience that people all over the world have with their open source software by significantly expanding the range of software we can deliver through this system. If you have a passion for clean APIs, believe that great engineers ship software calmly and regularly against an agile plan, and know that tests are the key to higher velocity and reliability, you'll fit right in.
   

  

 This is a great opportunity to take part in engineering a highly scalable SaaS product (think about the load on our systems when one of our largest Ubuntu Desktop snaps is updated by the publisher, for instance). In addition, you will have the opportunity to learn from Canonical's world-class security team as we work collectively to deliver this capability, safely, to our customers around the world.
   

  

 As an Engineering Manager at Canonical, you must be technically strong, but your main responsibility is to run an effective team and develop the colleagues you manage. You will develop and review code as a leader, but know that the best way to improve the product is to ensure that the whole team is focused, productive and unblocked. You are expected to help them grow as engineers, do meaningful work, do it outstandingly well, find professional and personal satisfaction, and work well with colleagues and the community. You will also be expected to be a positive influence on culture, facilitate technical delivery, and regularly reflect with your team on strategy and execution. You will collaborate closely with other Engineering Managers, product managers, and architects, producing an engineering roadmap with ambitious and achievable goals.
   

  

 We expect Engineering Managers to be fluent in the programming language, architecture, and components that their team uses. Code reviews and architectural leadership are part of the job. The commitment to healthy engineering practices, documentation, quality and performance optimisation is as important, as is the requirement for fair and clear management, and the obligation to ensure a high-performing team.
   

  

 This is a great opportunity to really learn how to do engineering of a highly-scalable SaaS product (think about the load on our systems when one of our largest Ubuntu Desktop snaps is updated by the publisher, for instance). In addition, you will have the opportunity to learn from Canonical's world-class security team as we work collectively to deliver this capability, safely, to our customers around the world.
   

  

**Location** 
 : This role may be based remotely in the Americas, Europe, Middle East or Africa time zones.
   

  

 What your day will look like
   

  

* Lead a remote team of engineers in your time zone
* Develop talent through coaching, mentoring, feedback, and hands-on career development
* Set and manage expectations with other engineering teams, management, and external stakeholders
* Be an active part of the leadership team and collaborate with other leaders in the organisation
* With your team, build clean web service APIs to support both CLI and web frontend clients, using Python (and optionally Golang).
* Engage with many other teams at Canonical, as well as the open-source community and commercial partners


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Good experience in leading modern, agile software development practices
* Experience in forming a healthy, collaborative engineering culture in line with the company values
* Demonstrative experience of being a role model for sound engineering principles and directly contributing toward your team's goals
* Willingness to travel up to 4 times a year for internal events
* You love to mentor, develop and grow people, and have a track record of doing it
* You are knowledgeable and passionate about software development
* You are focused on success and the timely delivery of high-quality software
* You value and nurture great team culture and spirit
* You have experience and commitment to agile development methodologies
* Software development experience in Python (experience in Golang in addition to that would be a big plus)
* Effective written and verbal communication skills
* Practical experience with Linux system administration


 What we offer you
   

  

 Your base pay will depend on various factors including your geographical location, level of experience, knowledge and skills. In addition to the benefits above, certain roles are also eligible for additional benefits and rewards including annual bonuses and sales incentives based on revenue or utilisation. Our compensation philosophy is to ensure equity right across our global workforce.
   

  

 In addition to a competitive base pay, we provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. Please note that additional benefits may apply depending on the work location and, for more information on these, you can ask in the later stages of the recruitment process.
   

  

* Fully remote working environment - we've been working remotely since 2004!
* Personal learning and development budget of 2,000USD per annum
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Parental leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues at 'sprints'
* Priority Pass for travel and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm that is at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do.
   

  

 Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Work at Canonical is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game. Canonical provides a unique window into the world of 21st-century digital business.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Senior/Quantitative Risk Analyst, EAD Models
description:
**Job ID: 25263** 






  
 





 We are looking for a Senior or Quantitative Risk Analyst to join EAD Models team at Nordea.  
 





  
 





 We are looking for credit risk model developers. The job provides an exciting mix of challenges, where different areas of knowledge and skills can be applied: developing advanced statistical models, designing internal software libraries, working with big data, analysing economic behaviour, understanding and abiding to regulatory constraints and further, to explain complex models to stakeholders on all levels across the bank. 
 





  
 





 At Nordea, we’re committed to being a partner our customers and society can count on. Compliance and integrity go hand in hand. Joining us means you’ll have an impact on how we do banking – today and tomorrow. So bring your ideas, skills and unique background. With us, you’ll be in good company with plenty of opportunities to collaborate, grow and make your mark on something bigger.
 





  

  



**About this opportunity** 


  
 





 Welcome to the EAD Models team, part of the Risk Models Methodology & IRB Models unit. Working with us, you will be a part of one of the most important programs for the bank, which consists in upscaling Nordea’s internal models for credit risk. There are opportunities to work on all aspects of IRB model development, scorecards, PD, LGD and CCF. 
 

  
 





 As the Quantitative Risk Analyst you will have great possibilities to develop your skills within advanced modelling – a field which is in high focus in Nordea.  Being a part of the broader Group Risk organization, you'll help ensure that compliance underpins every decision we make and every action we take. By bringing your perspectives to the team and through your focus on quality and cooperation, you will be important.
 





  
 





**What you’ll be doing:** 





* Develop and maintain IRB models
* Develop tools for data extraction for model development and other analysis
* Continuously work on improving methodological choices for the models and be able to clearly communicate its rationale and impact to internal and external stakeholders
* Join an open and inspiring atmosphere, where you will cooperate closely with your colleagues across the bank
* Give input to senior management and business based on data analysis and previous experience



  
 





 You will join a highly professional and dedicated team of quantitative analysts with a large network across the bank and with excellent opportunities for personal and professional development. Joining the team, you’ll have the opportunity to draw and leverage on your teammates’ expertise and commit to excellence. 
 





  

  



 The role is based in Warszawa; Gdańsk; Gdynia; Helsinki; Oslo; Stockholm.
   

  





**Who you are** 


  
 





 Collaboration. Ownership. Passion. Courage. These are the values that guide us in being at our best – and that we imagine you share the same values with us.
 





  
 





**To succeed in this role, we believe that you:** 





* Enjoy learning and are excited about bringing your ideas to the table
* Are dependable, willing to speak up even when it’s difficult
* Have excellent communication skills
* Are committed to empowering others



  
 





**Your experience and background:** 





* Master's or PhD degree in a quantitative field or software development field, including but not limited to mathematics, economics, statistics, data science, software engineering, computer science or similar
* Experience in SQL, Python, SAS or similar
* Experience working with data and models
* Experience in IRB/IFRS9 or CCF modelling is required



  
 





**Nice to have:** 





* Experience in driving deliveries, ideally in an agile environment
* Knowledge of credit risk processes would be an advantage
* Hands on experience in Big Data platforms, e.g. Hadoop
* Understanding of technologies and IT solutions used for data processing



  
 





 If this sounds like you, get in touch! 
 





  
 





**Next steps**




 Submit your application no later than
 



 15/09/2024
 



 .
   

  

 At Nordea, we know that an inclusive workplace is a sustainable workplace. We deeply believe that our diverse backgrounds, experiences, characteristics and traits make us better at serving customers and communities. So please come as you are.
 





  
 





 Please be aware that any applications or CVs coming through email or direct messages will not be accepted or considered.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Finland:** 
 A security clearance will be performed for the person selected for this position.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Sweden:** 
  For union information, please contact finansforbundet@nordea.se or SACONordea@nordea.com.
 





  
 





**Only for candidates in Poland:** 
 Please include permit for processing personal data in CV as following:
 





  
 





 In accordance with art. 6 (1) a and b. Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation) hereinafter ‘GDPR’. I agree to have: my personal data, education and employment history proceeded for the purposes of current and future recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp.
 





  
 





 The administrator of your personal data is: Nordea Bank Abp operating in Poland through its Branch, address: Aleja Edwarda Rydza Śmiglego 20, 93-281 Łodź. Your personal data will be processed for the recruitment processes in Nordea Bank Abp. You have a right to access your personal data, right to rectify and right to delete. Disclosing the personal data in the scope specified by the provisions of Polish Labour Code from 26 June 1974 and executive acts are mandatory. Providing personal data is necessary to conduct the recruitment processes. The request for the deletion of your personal data means resignation from further participation in recruitment processes and causes the immediate removal of your application. Detailed information concerning processing of your personal data can be found at: https://www.nordea.com/en/doc/nordea-privacy-policy-for-applicants.pdf
 





  
 





 We reserve the right to reply only to selected applications.

title: Erfaren IT-expert? Ta chansen och bli en del av Saab!
description:
*Vill du vara med och påverka i det större sammanhanget? På Saab bidrar du till hållbarhet som håller människa och samhälle säkert. Tillsammans kan vi påverka – Din del är viktig*
**Din roll**
 Som IT-expert kommer du att ingå i ett team som ansvarar för att övervaka IT-drift, installationer och underhåll av våra komplexa utvecklings- och produktionsmiljöer. Din expertis kommer bidra till att forma en smidig verksamhet genom att säkerställa nätverkseffektvitet, systemsäkerhet och optimal prestanda.
   

  

 Här kommer du tillsammans med kompetenta kollegor att utgöra ryggraden i vår IT-infrastruktur och arbeta i en innovativ miljö. Tillsammans arbetar ni mot uppdraget att hålla människor och samhällen säkra.
   

  

 På Saab erbjuder vi flera spännande roller inom IT området på flera av våra orter i Sverige.
   

  

 Några av de positioner där vi söker din expertis inom:
   

  

* Systemadministratörer
* Applikationsspecialister
* DevOps/DevSecOps
* IT-Arkitekter
* Specialist inom IT-säkerhet
* Dataingenjörer (BI or AI)


**Din profil**
 För att trivas på Saab tror du på en kultur av nyfikenhet, tillit och samarbete. Det spelar ingen roll om du är i början av din karriär eller är expert inom ditt område, det viktigaste är att du delar vår passion för IT och ny spännande teknik!
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har några års relevant erfarenhet eller utbildning inom IT och har ett intresse för att ständigt lära dig och utvecklas inom IT området.
   

  

 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsskyddsplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Det du blir del av**
 Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.
   

  

 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 22 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här

title: Project Portfolio Manager
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 We are now looking for a Project Portfolio Manager supporting our sales businesses in Customers Nordic
   

  

 In Customers Nordic we offer fossil free electricity and services to our Business- and Consumer sales customers. Digitalisation is one of our most prioritised areas and we are now looking for a
 **Project Portfolio Manager** 
 to manage the IT Project Portfolio and the IT Project Management Process, to ensure that it runs effectively and smoothly and to m
 **onitor and communicate the Project Portfolio performance towards the top management and throughout the organisation** 
**.** 
 The goal of the role is to maximize business value with focus at a strategic level to help the business to translate strategy into execution. The role also includes to coordinate and follow up the overall IT budget within Customers Nordic. The role is closely connected to the Nordic BIO for our sales operations in all Nordic countries and we offer you a challenging career in a fast developing energy business from the utility to a digitalised service in a new energy landscape. Are you the one?
   

  

**About The Position**
**Key Responsibilities of the Project Portfolio Manager**
* Process Owner: The Project Portfolio Manager is responsible to manage the Portfolio Management Process and to ensure that it runs effectively and smoothly. As the Project Portfolio Manager you will be the subject matter expert on portfolio management and as such, the process owner of the Portfolio Management Process. The Project Portfolio Manager should design and implement needed process steps and capabilities such as Portfolio Planning, Project Decision Making Process and Portfolio analysis and reporting.


 In this work, the Project Portfolio Manager should understand and analyse the portfolio maturity and understand the level of sophistication of the organisation to develop and implement necessary process improvements for the business to be successful.
   

  

* Monitoring and communication of Project Portfolio performance: The task of monitoring the Portfolio performance includes analysing project and portfolio data as well as develop reports, dashboards, and analytics to support the executive portfolio governance (Project Review Board). The Project Portfolio Manager communicates across the organisation about project and portfolio value, project and portfolio risk, project and portfolio performance, project and portfolio related decisions, and the portfolio management process.
* Process support: As the responsibility of The Project Portfolio Manager also includes to monitor the process effectivity and execution, the Project Portfolio Manager needs to be an advocate and educator of portfolio and project management towards the organisation, including educating and coaching senior leaders. To be able to succeed in this task, the Project Portfolio Manager should understand organisational change management in order to help the organisation to adopt the portfolio management processes.
* IT Budget and cost control: The Project Portfolio Manager is responsible to manage the overall IT Project Portfolio budget, follow the overall project spend and to report this to the Customer Nordic management team.


 In Customers Nordic, the role of the Project Portfolio Manager also includes a responsibility to coordinate and follow up the different operating units overall IT budget. This includes to participate in the yearly Business Planning Process with a responsibility to coordinate and report the overall IT budget forecast and IT spend and report to Customer Nordics management team and to the Business area Business Control.
   

  

 Din bakgrund
   

  

 We are looking for a Project Portfolio Manager who has minimum 10 years of relevant work experience. We believe you have good understanding of utility business processes and their IT capability needs. Moreover, you have strong communication skills and can communicate with different levels in the organisation. You know how to combine and balance stakeholders’ interests and are not afraid to take decisions to ensure output is being realised. We believe that you are passionate about your work and enjoy being in an ever-changing environment. Our ideal candidate, we believe has the following qualifications and qualities:
   

  

* Good understanding of the utility- and electricity business.
* Experience from working in a large international company.
* Experience of working with development of IT in a business context.
* Deep experience in Portfolio and Project Management, covering both processes, support and execution follow up.
* Experience from developing reports, dashboards, and analytics to support the executive portfolio governance and the IT budget process.
* Understanding and experience of agile methods and way of working.
* Understand organisational change management in order to help the organisation to adopt the portfolio management processes.
* Fluent in Swedish and English in written and spoken.
* Understanding of privacy and security regulations to ensure that privacy and security aspects are addressed in our IT development projects.
* Master’s degree with 10 years of experience of Portfolio and Project Management.


 Mer information
   

  

**Our Offer**
*We offer a challenging and international work environment and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues as ‘Ask and Share’ concept is essential for the way we work. We offer attractive employment conditions (smart working, flexible working hours and a good-work-life balance) and opportunities for personal and professional development. Click here for further information.*
**Location**
 Solna
   

  

**For more information** 
 about the position you are welcome to contact hiring manager Leif Sjöberg, +46703229045. For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter Cecilia Wijkman, cecilia.wijkman@vattenfall.com
   

  

 Trade Union representatives in Sweden via Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00.
   

  

 Rolf Olsson (Akademikerna) Cecilia Bodin (Ledarna) Mikael Mukka (SEKO) Jens Morell (Unionen)
   

  

**We welcome your application in English no later than Sept 6th 2024** 
 . We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website.
   

  

 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be a good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation. Click here for further information.
   

  

 The security of Vattenfall and its employees is essential. For that reason, a pre-employment screening will be part of your recruitment process. The screening is based on the role you will fulfill within Vattenfall.
   

  

 Since Vattenfall is a part of the Swedish critical infrastructure, many of our services are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidates might be subjected to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall is one of Europe’s largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 21 000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years. We now want to make fossil free living possible within one generation and we are driving the transition to a sustainable energy system.

title: Assistant Professor positions at Karolinska Institutet
description:
We seek inspiring, creative candidates that want to start their careers as independent researchers at the department of Medical Biochemistry and Biophysics (MBB), Karolinska Institutet. We are one of the largest departments at Karolinska Institutet, focused on basic research in biomedical sciences. We have a long and proud history of ground-breaking science, particularly developing innovative methods and applying them to understand fundamental human biology and the mechanisms that cause disease.
 



  





 MBB is located in the beautiful new Biomedicum research center, along with four other departments. You will join a vibrant community of more than a thousand researchers, with outstanding facilities and a wide range of talents. Biomedicum is situated close both to the Karolinska University Hospital (for clinical collaborations) and the Science for Life Laboratory, a national research infrastructure of unique technologies.
 



  





**This is who you are** 




 We seek candidates who dream big, aim high and want to solve important and fundamental biomedical problems. You should be open to new ideas and collaborations, responsive to the ideas of others, and willing to develop and test your skills in a team environment.
 



  





 The employment as Assistant Professor is time limited for 6 years with the right to apply for promotion to Senior Lecturer.
 



  





**What do we offer?** 




 If you have an outstanding proposal, we are ready to support you with a generous startup package, including six years employment as assistant professor and 13 MSEK unconditional research funding to cover your salary, rent, and any other research costs. the Department and KI will also provide support in the preparation of applications to Swedish and International grants such as ERC and KAW (Knut and Alice Wallenberg Foundation). We recognize the significance of supporting our researchers and their families. At our department, we appreciate the vital role that partners and families play in the lives of our scientists. Information about moving to Sweden can be found here https://staff.ki.se/international-staff and here https://www.sdcn.se/
 



 The department has broad interest and all areas of preclinical biomedical research are eligible, for example:
 



**Fundamental human biology and disease** 



* Mechanisms of transcriptional and translational gene regulation.
* Mechanistic roles for intermediary metabolism in mammalian physiology and pathology.
* Understanding molecular mechanisms in redox control of cellular functions.
* Biological effects of stable isotopes
* Neuroimmunology
* Brain disease, including multiple sclerosis, schizophrenia, neurodegenerative disease, brain cancer
* Cancer



  





**Technology** 



* Cryo-electron microscopy methods development and structural biology (300kV cold-FEG Krios
* microscope available)
* Ultra-high resolution light microscopy techniques (MINFLUX available)
* Linking imaging modalities, and linking imaging to omics
* Engineering of nucleic acid- or protein-based systems
* Protein design
* Precision cell or tissue engineering, e.g. CRISPR/Cas9-based (epi)genome editing, human
* organoids, cell printing
* Nucleic acid-based nanomedicines, delivery mechanisms, programmable drugs
* Methods development for high-throughput single-cell and spatial analysis of modalities as chromatin, RNA and protein, among others.
* Development of assays for clinical diagnostic



  





**About KI** 




 A creative, international and inspiring environment with wide-ranging expertise and interests. Karolinska Institutet is one of the world's leading medical universities. Here, we conduct successful medical research and hold the largest range of medical education in Sweden. At KI, you get to meet researchers working with a wide range of specialisms and methods, giving you ample opportunity to exchange knowledge and experience with the various scientific fields within medicine and health. It is the crossover collaborations, which have pushed KI to where it is today, at the forefront of global research. Several of the people you meet in healthcare are educated at KI. A close relationship with the health care providers is important for creating groundbreaking top quality education and research. Karolinska Institutet is also a state university, which entitles you to several good benefits through our collective agreement.
 



  





**Eligibility requirements** 




 Those eligible for employment as an Assistant Professor are individuals who have been awarded a PhD or attained equivalent research competence. Preference should be given to those who were awarded a PhD or attained equivalent research competence no more than five years prior to the expiry of the application period for the position as assistant professor, but excellent applicants who have completed their PhD more than five years ago are also welcome to apply.
 



**Location:** 
 Solna
 







  





**Application** 




 We prefer that Your application is written in English, but You can also apply in Swedish. An application must contain the following documents:
 


* CV (up to 3 pages) including contact information to two references, preferably previous supervisors, and description of their professional relationship to the applicant. Clearly state the PhD date. Clearly state the names of all previous supervisors (PhD supervisor, post-doc supervisor(s)).
* List of 5 most relevant original (not reviews, corresponding- or views- pieces) publications for the application in exactly this format:
 *Full title, year, Journal, All authors listed in the original published order with the applicant's name in bold and the PhD and/or Post-doc supervisors names underlined (when they are on the papers). Mark shared authorships. – Changes to the author order or similar will disqualify the application.*
* Research plan (up to 5 pages, excluding references)
* A PDF of your single most important paper or preprint



  





 Welcome to apply at the latest
 **2024-09-13** 




  





 The application is to be submitted through the Varbi recruitment system
 



  





**Want to make a difference? Join us and contribute to better health for all**

title: Local Trial Manager
description:
**HOW MIGHT YOU DEFY IMAGINATION?**
 You’ve earned your degree. How will you use that achievement to reach your goals? Do more with the knowledge you’ve worked hard to acquire and the passion you already have. At Amgen, our shared mission—to serve patients—drives all that we do. It is key to our becoming one of the world’s leading biotechnology companies, reaching over 10 million patients worldwide. Become the professional you are meant to be in this meaningful role.
   

  

**Local Trial Manager (LTM)**
**Live**
**What You Will Do**
 In this vital role you will be the primary point of contact to lead, manage and co-ordinate the conduct of clinical trials from study start-up to close out at a country level in accordance with ICH-GCP and other applicable local regulations. You will maintain the quality and scientific integrity of clinical trials at a local/country level and actively collaborate with cross functional internal and external partners to ensure timely delivery, budget execution of clinical trial results within the local country.
   

  

 You will be working closely with the Nordic & Baltic Global Study Organization based in Stockholm and also with the local medical affairs teams in the Nordic & Baltic countries.
   

  

 The position is based in Solna in Stockholm with flexibility to work remotely on a part time basis.
   

  

**Key Activities**
* Partner with global and local country teams to provide high level country strategy and actively drive study progress and local/country level study delivery
* Responsible for compiling and submitting submissions to ethics committees/councils within the country/ies as well as submissions relating to other aspects country needs
* Planning, management, and oversight of clinical study execution in accordance with the global program strategy
* Communicate country status (including timelines and deliverables) to key partners including updates to relevant systems for transparency
* Accountable for site-level goal setting and study-specific deliverables for clinical sites within their country(ies)
* Implement regulatory agency inspection readiness activities
* Support internal audit and inspection activities and contribute to CAPAs, including leading resolution of issues when appropriate e.g., vendor management
* Lead and continually review country level risk mitigation activities to ensure study delivers to plan
* Maintain relevant therapeutic knowledge
* Drive site evaluation and selection process within country


**Win**
**What We Expect Of You**
 We are all different, yet we all use our unique contributions to serve patients. The qualified professional we seek is a Trial Manager with these qualifications.
   

  

**Minimum Requirements**
* Life Science degree & directly related work experience
* Knowledge of global clinical trial management
* Fluency in a Scandinavia language both in speaking and writing
* Fluency in business English in both speaking and writing


**Preferred Requirements**
* Experience of leading local/regional or global teams
* Clinical trial project management experience
* Previous work experience in life sciences or medically related field, biopharmaceutical clinical research experience obtained working on clinical trials in a biotech, pharmaceutical or CRO company
* Experience in management and oversight of external vendors (e.g., CROs, central labs, imaging vendors, etc.)
* Local/country knowledge with proven project management experience locally
* Knowledge of other Nordic and Baltic languages


**Thrive**
**Some of the vast rewards of working here**
 As we work to develop treatments that take care of others, we also work to care for our teammates’ professional and personal growth and well-being.
   

  

* Full support and career-development resources to expand your skills, enhance your expertise, and maximize your potential along your career journey
* A diverse and inclusive community of belonging, where teammates are empowered to bring ideas to the table and act
* Generous Total Rewards Plan—comprising health, finance and wealth, work/life balance, and career benefits


**Apply now**
**for a career that defies imagination**
 Objects in your future are closer than they appear. Join us.
   

  

**careers.amgen.com**
 Amgen is an Equal Opportunity employer and will consider you without regard to your race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability status.
   

  

 We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.
   

  

 For more information about the position, please contact Eleonore Hassila, Human Resources Lead Sweden: +46 76 109 9428
   

  

 For union related questions, please contact Daniel Erlandsson: derlands@amgen.com

title: Legal Counsel, Privacy
description:
o you have experience integrating GDPR legal requirements with practical privacy advice on technical, security, and customer journey matters?
 



 We are excited to announce that SEB Embedded is looking for a Legal Counsel to join us in our mission to pioneer the future of financial services! We are seeking a data privacy-passionate team-player who is not afraid of exploring the unknown and wants to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. But most importantly - we are looking for someone who wants to be in it to win it as a team!
 



  





**What You Will Do** 




  





 As SEB Embedded scales, your responsibilities will evolve. Initially, we would like you to:
 



  




* **Support Privacy Matters** 
 : Assist with privacy assessments for SEB Embedded's current and new business initiatives.
* **Provide Clear, Actionable Advice** 
 : Guide our security, platform, and insights teams on implementing privacy measures within their areas of responsibility.
* **Collaborate on Privacy Risks** 
 : Work with relevant stakeholders to identify and address privacy risks related to new products and processes.
* **Draft and Update Policies** 
 : Create and maintain privacy policies and cookie notices.
* **Continuous Risk Follow-Up** 
 : Monitor and evaluate privacy risks associated with ongoing initiatives.
* **Participate in Reviews and Audits** 
 : Assess the outcomes of customer reviews and audits.
* **Enhance Customer Experience** 
 : Partner with the Customer Lifecycle team to develop a smooth customer experience where privacy is integrated.
* **Elevate Privacy Knowledge** 
 : Conduct training sessions and create privacy-related FAQs, guidelines, and handbooks to enhance the organization's understanding of privacy matters.



  





**Who You Are** 




  




* **Experience** 
 : 2-4 years of experience in legal matters related to GDPR and privacy. Experience at a Swedish law firm, authorities, or in the financial sector is a plus.
* **Detail-Oriented** 
 : Strong administrative skills with a keen eye for detail.
* **Self-Driven and Collaborative** 
 : Capable of working independently and contributing effectively to cross-functional teams, managing multiple projects simultaneously.
* **Practical Advisor** 
 : Able to provide hands-on, risk-based advice that the business can implement.
* **Flexible** 
 : Thrive in a fast-paced environment and view each day as an opportunity to explore and develop your skills.
* **Technical and Security Expertise** 
 : Experience in technical and security-related fields is a significant advantage, as GDPR extends beyond just legal aspects.
* **Strong Communicator:** 
 Excellent communication skills with the ability to understand and adapt to the audience you are engaging with.
* **Project Management:** 
 Demonstrated ability to lead privacy-related projects from inception to completion, ensuring all milestones are met and objectives are achieved.



  





 We don't expect you to know everything but we do expect you to have curiosity, willingness to learn and stretch your comfort zone.
 



  





**What we offer** 




  





 We believe in a healthy work-life balance meaning we encourage a hybrid set-up that puts emphasis on flexibility and autonomy. Your unique talents and skills are important to us, therefore we want you to thrive in your development and have the chance to grow within the organization in a way that resonates with your aspirations.
 



  





 We offer the best of both worlds; the stability and security of an established company together with the innovation and energy of a scale-up. As part of your journey, working alongside exceptional colleagues, we want to make sure to nurture your skills while you contribute to our collective success!
 



  





 Due to summer vacations approaching, we will begin to review applications in August.

title: Systemspecialist MiCCE
description:
På Tele2 Företag (B2B) arbetar vi varje dag för att möjliggöra ett samhälle med obegränsade möjligheter genom vår breda portfölj av it- och telekomrelaterade produkter och tjänster. Med ett team av kunniga experter hjälper vi kunder inom privat och offentlig sektor att digitalisera sin verksamhet, bli mer hållbara och uppnå sin affärspotential.
   

  

 Vi behöver nu förstärka vårt MiCCE-team och söker en Senior Contact-Center Specialist med systemutvecklingskunskap!
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Mitel’s MiCC Enterprise är en av våra lösningar för contact-center. Som specialist kliver du raka vägen in i ett av våra viktigaste team. Tillsammans ansvarar ni för samhällsbärande funktioner, som ligger i framkant när det gäller systemintegration inom tele- och datakommunikation med MiCCE som plattform. Du kommer att arbeta med kunden i centrum och tillsammans med Sveriges skickligaste specialister inom området. Det är en dynamisk miljö och vi har roligt längs vägen. Låter det spännande? Läs vidare!
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifterna innefattar att:**
* Ingå i tekniska/konsultativa projekt
* Arbeta med utveckling och konsulttjänster kring kundens lösning i nära kundkontakt.
* Delta i eller bedriva förstudier där man behöver förstå kundernas behov för att kunna erbjuda relevanta lösningar.
* Support i felsökning och felavhjälpning


**Vem är du?**
 För att trivas i rollen bör du ha intresse och förmåga att utveckla och förvalta våra kundrelationer. Du känner därför stort engagemang för det du gör och har en naturlig vana att jobba med service och support. Våra kunder finns inom offentlig sektor, olika företagssegment och branscher, vilket ger en stor variation i arbetet. Det kräver även en förmåga att prioritera och analysera samt en lyhördhet och förståelse för olika kundbehov. Att du vill utveckla och utvecklas med ditt arbete ser vi som en självklarhet. Likaså en nyfikenhet och ett intresse för telefoni och teknik.
   

  

**Vidare ser vi gärna att du har:**
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom tele-/datakom och systemutveckling, eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Erfarenhet av systemintegration med contact-center
* Förståelse för tex Rest, Json, VB .Net, Xml
* Kunskap inom nätverk, SIP och telekom
* Kunskap inom Microsoft Server, Visual Studio och SQL.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av AI i kombination med contact-center är meriterande.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift

title: Art Director Intern
description:
***Hi, I’m Gustav, the founder of Buility.***
 We’re a startup based in Stockholm city, and we’re all about fresh ideas and making things happen. We need someone who can help us show off what we do through awesome designs & creative ideas.
   

  

***We’re looking for an Art Director Intern* 
 .** 
 If you’re feeling creative & studying graphic design or visual arts and want to see your ideas come to life, this is for you. Here, you can try new things and really make your mark.
   

  

**Your Job Will Involve Things Like**
* Designing our website to make it cool and welcoming.
* Creating visuals that tell our story.
* Helping us look consistent and sharp across all our stuff.


***What’s in it for you?***
* Dive into the tech and AI world.
* Real freedom to test out your wildest ideas.
* Flexibility to work from home a few days a week.
* Great for your school internship or “LIA Praktik”.


***Interested? We’d love to meet you!***

title: Senior .Net Utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett behov hos en kund efter en .Net Utvecklare och söker därför en kollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.  

  

**Vår ambitioner**  

Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.  

  

**Jobbeskrivning**  

Vi söker efter en senior .NET utvecklare som kan stötta vårt team som är mitt i en teknisk transformationsresa.


Vi behöver en person som föredrar att jobba hands-on med kodning, som kan följa tekniska besluta och efterleva utsatt roadmap. Samt drivs av att leverera affärsnytta.


Rollen innebär att ingå i ett team som ansvarar för både förvaltning och nyutveckling inom vår systemdomän


Detta kräver att personen kan hantera både gammal och ny teknik då vi ligger mitt i transformationen.


Domänen ansvarar för centrala systemet inom affärsområdet. Där vi har det huvudsakliga bassystemet samt kringliggande system.  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* .NET (Core) and .NET Framework
* Web API
* WCF
* Winforms
* Entity Framework
* NHibernate
* Microsoft SQL Server 2019
* Azure DevOps. Build and release pipelines
* Azure Service Bus or experience with other service bus
* Good practice with Unit test
* Good practice with code review

  

**Meriterande**  

* React
* Clean Code
* Domain drive design

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 19-09-2024  

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 **Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.  

  

Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.


Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.  

  

Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket och semestertider dröjer återkoppling längre än vanligt.

title: Senior DevOps Manager
description:
KG Knutsson AB Vår vision är att föra människor framåt. Med våra produkter och tjänster tar vi människan framåt på vägen, genom livet, i rusningstrafiken, på semestern eller på jobbet. Vill man göra det lätt för sig säger man att vi med vår e-handelsplats autokatlogen.se säljer reservdelar och tillbehör till bilar, lastbilar, bussar, båtar och arbetsfordon. Det är onekligen en stor del av vår omsättning. Men vi är så mycket mer, vi deltar i omställningen till en fossilfri fordonsflotta med vårt dotterbolag Carsmart, vi strävar mot att skapa en cirkulär ekonomi för de delar av transportbranschen vi verkar i, vi har som mål att genom smarta produkter och tjänster skydda liv på vägarna. Genom hela vår historia har långsiktiga relationer värderats högt och lika så att kunna erbjuda våra kunder produkter med hög kvalitet. Vi har en privat ägare, är cirka 1300 medarbetare och vi finns förutom i Sverige också i Norge, Finland, Estland, Lettland och Litauen.### **Sammanfattning**

  

KGK IT är en koncerngemensam funktion som ansvara för alla KGK’s system på de marknader där KGK har verksamhet.



Senior DevOps Manager ansvarar för att säkerställa driften och underhållet av företagets Core IT-infrastruktur och system, inklusive nätverk-, server-, och säkerhetstjänster. Rollen innebär att övervaka, stödja och förbättra driften av olika tekniska plattformar, säkerställa hög tillgänglighet och prestanda samt implementera nya lösningar och uppdateringar.



Vidare ingår det att vara med i KGK’s transformation till en ny teknisk infrastruktur primärt hostad i Azure.

  


### **Ansvarsområden**


**Team lead**



Du skall ansvara och leda ett internt team som är placerade i Sverige (flera siter) och i Finland. Du kommer att ingå i KGK IT:s ledningsgrupp och ha budgetansvar för gruppen och för IT-driftverksamheten.


**Nätverksinfrastruktur**



Design, implementering och underhåll av WAN, LAN och WLAN nätverkslösningar.


**Server- och klientinfrastruktur**



Design, implementering och underhåll av serverinfrastruktur, inklusive Azure infrastruktur, fysiska och virtuella servrar.  

Design, implementering och underhåll av klientinfrastruktur såsom PC och mobila enheter.


**IT-Säkerhet**



Hantering av brandväggar och nätverkssäkerhet.  

Kunskap och erfarenhet av säkerhetsfunktioner och bästa praxis inom Microsoft 365, inklusive:  

Microsoft Defender  

Microsoft Intune och Endpoint Management  

Säkerhets- och efterlevnadscenter i Microsoft 365  

Entra ID och identitetshantering  

Skydd av känslig information med hjälp av Microsoft Information Protection



Säkerhetskopiering och återställning, hantering av backup-tjänster  

Säkerställande av regelbundna säkerhetskopior och återställningsprocedurer


**Övervakning och rapportering**



Övervakning av IT-system och tjänster.  

Proaktiv hantering av potentiella problem och säkerställande av kontinuerlig drift.



Uppdragets 3 delar:  

* Att vara med och planera, genomföra och följa upp förvaltningsuppdrag
* Att vara en del av 2nd line Support
* Projektresurs
  

I tjänsten ingår att bemanna IT-beredskapstjänstgöring

  


**Personliga egenskaper och kvalifikationer**



Vi söker dig som är en ledare och lagspelare med förmåga att samarbeta effektivt med kollegor och intressenter. Du är flexibel och hjälpsam, och du trivs i en prestigelös miljö där alla bidrar till teamets gemensamma mål. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du vara självgående och kunna ta egna initiativ.



Vi ser gärna att du har ett stort intresse för teknik och kontinuerligt håller dig uppdaterad med de senaste trenderna och utvecklingarna inom området. Din förmåga att omvärldsbevaka och applicera ny kunskap är en viktig del av ditt arbete hos oss.



Du har också erfarenhet av att arbeta med planeringsboard (tex Jira) för förvaltningsarbete, och du är van vid att strukturera och planera ditt och teamets arbete effektivt. Om du dessutom är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och har en positiv inställning kommer du att passa perfekt in i vårt team.

  


**Krav**



God samarbetsförmåga och erfarenhet av teamarbete i ledande ställning.  

Flexibel och hjälpsam inställning.  

Prestigelös med fokus på gemensamma mål.  

Självgående och initiativrik.  

Stort tekniskt intresse och förmåga att hålla sig uppdaterad med ny teknologi.  

Erfarenhet av omvärldsbevakning inom teknikområdet.  

Vana vid att arbeta med planeringsboard för förvaltningsarbete.

  


**Teknologier (urval)**


* Microsoft 365 (inklusive AD/Entra ID, Security, Compliance, Exchange, Teams, Intune, SharePoint)
* Azure Infrastructure such as:
+ Azure VMs
+ Azure storage
+ Azure Service Bus
+ Azure Application Insight
+ Cloudflare CDN

* VMware och Veeam
* Palo Alto Firewall
* Windows Server/Client
* Linux Server
* Pingdom
* Raygun

  


**Du erbjuds**


* **Spännande tjänst:** En roll där du får möjlighet att utveckla både företaget och dess medarbetare. Du kommer att ha stor påverkan på vår resa framåt och vara med och skapa strukturer som leder oss in i framtiden
* **Innovation**: Vi är en av de ledande aktörerna inom fordonsbranschen och arbetar med de senaste teknologierna och lösningarna
* **Engagerande Arbetsmiljö**: Hos oss värdesätts medarbetarnas idéer och initiativ, och vi erbjuder en dynamisk och stöttande arbetskultur
* **Hållbarhet i Fokus**: Vi strävar efter att minska vår miljöpåverkan och ser denna roll som central för att nå våra hållbarhetsmål
* **Utvecklingsmöjligheter**: Vi investerar i våra medarbetares utveckling genom utbildning och karriärmöjligheter
* **Trygghet**: En stabil arbetsgivare som erbjuder en tillsvidareanställning med inledande provanställning

  


**Övrig information**


**Start**: Så snart som möjligt med hänsyn till uppsägningstid


**Omfattning**: Heltid, tillsvidare, vi tillämpar provanställning


**Placeringsort**: Sollentuna. Arbetet sker hybrid/onsite med ca tre dagar på kontoret per vecka.



Vi tillämpar löpande urval vilket gör att tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdagen.



Vi ser fram emot din ansökan och möjligheten att välkomna dig till oss på KGK!

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**We are looking for an experienced DevOps Engineer eager to join a team where your skills will ensure the scalability and stability of our product.**

  

The Mediatool infrastructure has evolved organically from a single web server to one with a few side services. We plan to add more to this and as we do, we want to make sure our infrastructure is of high quality.  

  

We want to streamline deployment of the app with zero downtime, smooth version rollback, have the ability to easily spin up test environments etc. In addition to that there are multiple workflows for the product team that can be improved. 20 developers will love you and praise your work if you manage to achieve this.


To be suited for this job, you should be excited about getting into the configuration of today while also having the vision of where we you want to take the infrastructure. While we already have ideas on where to go, we expect your experience and knowledge to be the foundation for us to make the best decisions on what services and configurations to use.

#### **Responsibilities**

* Create and manage the infrastructure for the Mediatool app
* Create a stable deployment pipeline so that deploys are automatic
* Make sure ping times are low regardless of where in the world our users are located
* Improve the workflows for our dev team and through that the life of our developers.
* Manage our CI server (currently Circle CI)

#### **Skills and qualifications**

* 3 years of experience as a DevOps Engineer hosting a similar app
* 3 years of JavaScript coding experience
* Linux Lover

#### **Included in the job**


Amazing colleagues, team spirit, exciting projects, thankful customers, endless coffee, soda and red bull


#### **Not included in the job**


Micro management, long recurring meetings, day long planning poker sessions, grumpy bosses
company_description: Mediatool is a cloud-based remote marketing platform that helps teams to plan, execute, track & optimise media and marketing campaigns.

title: ICT Architect(7)
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------


**About this opportunity:**

  

Ericsson SAN Lab Operations have a strategy to transform the infrastructure service delivery in global standardized ICT environments based on software defined automated services with the aim to enable consumption of services through either a portal or application programming interface (API). This would enable further automation in the consumers’ organizations, mainly the different R&D units within Ericsson.


The new person will be a regular team member within the SD&D unit. He/she is expected to be a senior experienced person, with at least 10 years of experience in software engineering in a context of automation of infrastructure consumption services. Strong preference will go to anyone with additional network and/or network security operations, as well as in systems engineering in any part of the Information & Communications Technology (ICT) domain. The achievements track record for the person will also be considered.

 **What you will do:**

  

Support service design and development activities, from pre-study to in-production in a corporate data center environment.


Support service automation with software development expertise, from the architecture design phase until the automated service in deployed in production.


Lead the automation implementation phase, from the service architecture design outcome, lead software architecture design for the new automation, and support updates to the development ecosystem (development environment, development support tools…).


Lead assignments together with other architects to ensure long term sustainability for the automation software, and end-to-end architectural software consistency and integration.


Follow a requirement-based approach and architectural system design.


Apply requirements engineering’s best practices during system design and aligning to Ericsson’s requirements engineering processes.

**The skills you bring:**

* Experience in creating architectures for REST CRUD applications.
* Experience in creating large scale deployment applications.
* Experience with design of CI/CD setups and related tools.
* Experience in creating architectures for REST CRUD applications.
* Experience in creating large scale deployment applications.
* Experience with design of CI/CD setups and related tools.
* Experience designing testing & verifications setups, as well as related tools.
* Experience with containerized service deployment.
* Experience in lean and agile ways of working and its implementation in large organizations.
* Experience with DevOps.
* Experience in network services and/or operations is a major plus.
* Excellent competence in secure architectural system and service design.
* Strong understanding of development practices (Python; REST API's and JSON; Perl; Ansible, YAML, GIT/Gerrit…).
* Understanding of Ericsson's global network infrastructure is a plus.
* Scripting languages (ex.: Perl), Ansible, TypeScript, Jenkins, PHP, MySQL
* Structured and see documentation as a natural way of working.
* Proven track record of achieving results in challenging environment.
* Experience interacting with stakeholders in an international environment.
* Proven track record of being a team player, interacting with strong and highly qualified colleagues.
* See the strength in diversity and gender equality.

 **What happens once you apply?**

  

Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.

  

We encourage you to consider applying to jobs where you might not meet all the criteria. We recognize that we all have transferrable skills, and we can support you with the skills that you need to develop.

  

Encouraging a diverse an inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer, learn more.

 **Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Linköping

**Job details:** ICT Architect

**Job Stage:** Job Stage 7

**Primary Recruiter:** Suman Thakur

**Hiring Manager:** Joseph-Desire Kouam
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: Configuration Engineer
description:
Configuration Engineer


Swedium Global is looking for Configuration Engineer for one of its customer


**Location**: Sweden, Gothenburg, Poland, Warsaw. 3 days at the office  

**Language**: Fluent English  

**Duration**: 6 months with possible extension


**Job description**


We are looking to hire Configuration Engineers who will be responsible for planning, estimating, and  

configuring clinical studies software.  

Our experts are at the core of the project, collaborating with cross-functional teams in determining  

requirements, investigating, localizing, preventing, and eliminating various issues.


**Overview of responsibilities**


* Manage the end-to-end process connected to software configuration.
* Determine configuration and integration requirements.
* Analyze requirements and business needs.
* Outline deadlines and provide estimations.
* Coordinate with the development and QA teams the dependencies on deliveries and releases
* Collaborate and communicate closely with stakeholders.
* Create, commit and review configurations.
* Fix any defects in the configuration.
* Hold requirements team accountable for assets deadlines.
* Remove any blockers that might affect the configuration deadline.
* Communicate configuration readiness to the Program Manager/ Implementation Lead
* Maintain source code in version control tools for different projects with branching and merging


 strategies.
**Required skills & experience**


* Experience and good understanding of version control process and systems
* Knowledge of JSON, XML, and TypeScript
* Experience and understanding of software development processes.
* Experience with Git, NPM/Yarn
* Ability to work independently in defining requirements.


**Desired skills & experience**  

* QA and/or DevOps processes
* Microsoft Visual Studio/Xcode, Postman, JIRA or similar, Service Desk or similar
* Agile environment
* Azure pipelines
* In a similar position and in integrating software with medical devices

  
Job Overview


* Location : Gothenburg, Sweden or Warsaw, Poland, Sweden or Poland
* Vacancy : 1
* Key Skills : Version Control, JSON, XML, Typescript, GIT, NPM/Yam, DevOps, QA, Visual Studio, Postman, JIRA, Azure pipelines

title: Erfaren teknisk testare/testautomatiserare – Stockholm deltid
description:
Modernera är ett modernt rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag. www.modernera.se
  
För en kunds räkning söker vi nu en erfaren teknisk testare/testautomatiserare. Vår kund levererar lösningar som gör att deras kunder kan öka förändringstakt och kvalitet i sina digitala tjänster. Företagets kunder finns främst bland teleoperatörer, offentlig sektor, bank och försäkring i Sverige och Norge. Företaget har funnits sedan 1999 och består idag av ett 60-tal medarbetare.
  
Du kommer att jobba i trevliga lokaler i centrala Stockholm. Det finns möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån.
  
Du kommer att arbeta i varierande projekt och stå inför intressanta utmaningar för att effektivisera företagets kunders tekniska vardag.
  
Du kommer att erbjudas en gedigen utvecklingsresa och dina kunskaper kommer omvandlas till nytta som gör skillnad. Du är alltid uppbackad av erfarna kollegor samt den gemensamma kunskapen som utgör kärnan i företagets framgångar.
  
  

**Du har några av dessa egenskaper/erfarenheter:**  

Utbildning på kandidatnivå
  
Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet
  
Teknisk testning
  
Testautomatiseringsverktyg (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, Test Complete, UFT)
  
Agila arbetssätt
  
CI/CD-verktyg (Azure DevOps, Gitlab, Jenkins)
  
Programmering (JavaScript, Java)
  
Enhetstestramverk (JUnit, Cucumber)
  
Versionshantering (Git)
  
  

**Meriterande:**  

Kunskap inom modern infrastruktur med containers/mikrotjänster (som Kubernetes plattformar)
  
Att ta fram teststrategier
  
Att coacha andra inom testautomation
  
Sätta upp ramverk
  
ISTQB-certifiering
  
  

**Du får:**  

Arbeta i utmanande projekt med teknik i framkant
  
Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling där certifieringar är en självklarhet
  
Vara en del av en stimulerande arbetsmiljö med högt i tak
  
Åka på spännande konferensresor med roliga aktiviteter
  
Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, pensionsersättning, ett ordentligt friskvårdsbidrag och andra generösa förmåner
  
Du kommer att bli anställd hos vår kund. Deltid. Provanställning som övergår i en tillsvidareanställning efter sex månader. Tillträde: omgående.
  
Ansök genom att skicka ditt CV och personligt brev till info@modernera.se. Skriv ”Erfaren teknisk testare/testautomatiserare – Stockholm deltid” i ärenderaden.

title: Junior System- och Applikationsadministratör
description:
Varberg Energi är en energi- och IT-koncern som ägs av Varbergs kommun genom Varbergs Stadshus AB. Vi är idag drygt 130 anställda och omsatte under 2023 upp mot en miljard kronor. Våra verksamhetsgrenar är elnät, fjärrvärme, elhandel, belysning, gas, energitjänster och bredband. Vår främsta utveckling sker inom förnybar energi och flexibilitet, där vi erbjuder Flextjänster så att fler kunder och producenter kan vara med och delta aktivt i framtidens energisystem. Läs mer på
  
www.varbergenergi.se
  
  

ARBETSUPPGIFTER
  
Är du i början av din IT-karriär och redo för en utmaning inom system- och applikationsadministration? Vill du vara en del av ett team som driver innovation och effektivitet i ett ledande energiföretag? Vi söker nu en driven Junior System- och Applikationsadministratör som vill växa med oss.
  
  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**  

* Aktivt delta i förvaltningen av våra IT-system och applikationer.
* Stödja våra projektledningsprocesser med hjälp av verktyg som MS DevOps, Trello och Monday.
* Tillhandahålla teknisk support och vara en hjälpande hand till dina kollegor.
* Engagera dig i hela utvecklingsprocessen, från utveckling till förvaltning.
* Analysera och lösa avancerade tekniska problem.
* Bidra till vidareutvecklingen av våra befintliga applikationer, inklusive Power BI-rapporter.
* Effektivt felsöka dataflöden mellan olika system och integrationer.
* Utveckla goda relationer och samarbeta med både internt och externt med kollegor och kunder.


KVALIFIKATIONER
  
  

**Vi söker dig som:**  

* Är nyutexaminerad eller har något års erfarenhet inom IT.
* Har en god förståelse för projektledningsmetodik och är bekväm med att använda relaterade verktyg.
* Är serviceinriktad och har en naturlig förmåga att ge teknisk support.
* Har en grundläggande förståelse för analys av komplexa problem.
* Är intresserad av att vidareutveckla applikationer och har en vilja att lära sig nya tekniker.
* Har en god förmåga att kommunicera och samarbeta med olika intressenter.
* Har kunskap om eller är villig att lära sig agila IT-utvecklingsmetoder.
* Delar våra värdeord: mod, kunskap, framåtanda och nytänkande.


Vi på Varberg Energi tror starkt på att mångfald berikar vår arbetsplats och stärker vår förmåga att leverera innovativa lösningar. Vi strävar efter att främja jämställdhet och att skapa en inkluderande arbetsmiljö där alla medarbetare känner sig välkomna och värderade, oavsett bakgrund, kön, ålder, etnicitet och religion.
  
  

ÖVRIGT
  
Inför denna rekrytering har vi noggrant valt vilka annonsplatser vi vill annonsera i och undanber oss därför kontakt med annonsörer och bemanningsföretag!

title: Data Science / AI Engineer
description:
Curamet AB
  
Curamet AB, established in March 2017 in Malmö, Sweden, is a leading IT company that delivers innovative solutions across various industries, including IT, Telecom, Banking, Health, and Retail. Our expert team has extensive knowledge and experience in providing Platform as a Service (PaaS), Software as a Service (SaaS), and Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) solutions. At Curamet, we pride ourselves on offering accurate, secure, cost-effective services through Agile, DevOps, GitOps, and resource management strategies. With over six years of excellence in DevOps and cloud enablement, we are dedicated to streamlining development and operations to help businesses achieve a faster time to market and enhance their overall efficiency. As we continue to grow, we are excited to announce a new opportunity to join our dynamic team and contribute to our mission of driving technological innovation and excellence.
  
  

**Job Summary:**  

As a Data Science / AI Engineer, you will be crucial in designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models and AI solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business challenges, gather requirements, and translate them into effective data-driven strategies. Your work will build predictive models, develop algorithms, and implement scalable AI solutions to solve real-world problems.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Design and develop machine learning models and algorithms to solve complex business problems.
  
Collaborate with data engineers to acquire, preprocess, and transform data from various sources.
  
Implement and optimize AI models for deployment in production environments.
  
Work with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for leveraging data to drive business solutions.
  
Perform data exploration, feature engineering, and model validation to ensure robust and accurate models.
  
Develop and maintain scalable machine learning pipelines and frameworks.
  
Monitor model performance and ensure continuous improvement through retraining and optimization.
  
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and data science to propose innovative solutions.
  
Communicate results and insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  
Document processes, models, and algorithms for reproducibility and knowledge sharing.
  
  

**Qualifications:**  

Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
  
3+ years of experience in data science, machine learning, or AI engineering.
  
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java.
  
Experience with machine learning frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, or Keras.
  
Solid understanding of statistical methods, data preprocessing, and feature engineering techniques.
  
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Matplotlib, Seaborn, Tableau).
  
Familiarity with big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, or NoSQL databases.
  
Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
  
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently and in a team.
  
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  
  

**Preferred Qualifications:**  

BSC Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field.
  
Experience with natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, or deep learning.
  
Knowledge of MLOps and experience with CI/CD pipelines for machine learning.
  
Familiarity with version control systems such as Git.
  
Experience in the industry-specific domain (e.g., finance, healthcare, retail).
  
  

Öppen för alla
  
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

title: Tech Lead - Identity & Access Mgmt (EntraID & AD)
description:
We are looking for a Tech Lead within Identity & Access Management.
  
  

**Assignment Description:**  

We are looking for a new team member to our Collaboration Services team. The team handles M365, AD & EntraID, trying to create a great user experience for the organization colleagues.
  
Our teams work in a DevOps setup, meaning the team owns the full scope of their product - new development, operational development / continuous improvements and support.
  
We work with relentless automation of repetitive work and for an increased level of self-service for our users, and are therefore looking to strengthen the team with a developer who can contribute and drive this area.
  
You will belong to a team working in an agile way to together solve problems and create solutions based on modern software development practices. The team has its own Azure subscription, and are moving to work within the boundaries of the Organization's event driven architecture. We are looking to strengthen the team with a developer / tech lead or hands-on solution architect who can help us modernize and automate our EntraID- & AD ecosystem. We are in a hybrid environment and we think this can be improved in order to serve the needs better. We also see potential upcoming collaborations or integrations in the larger Organization Holding context, connecting several organizations' IAM capabilities to each other.
  
We believe you have experience in managing Azure cloud resources and in developing automations in an event driven way, using Azure functions among other Azure components.
  
  

**Skill requirements:**  

We would like to see that our new team member is well acquainted with, or very curious about:
  
Group policies, conditional access & MFA config
  
Microsoft Defender & MS Purview configuration
  
Event based integrations between EntraID & AD and systems like ServiceNow, SuccessFactors
  
Hybrid AD & EntraID setup
  
Powershell or other script languages
  
Azure
  
Modern software development practices (Infrastructure as Code, GitOps etc)
  
GitHub & GitHub Actions
  
Event-driven architecture (PubSub, Streaming etc)
  
Serverless / Azure functions
  
  

**Location:** Gothenburg/Stockholm/Västra Götaland/Remote

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
DevOps Engineer | Fintech | AWS | Microservices | Kubernetes | Stockholm | Cloud Computing
 



  





**About the Company:** 
 This company is revolutionizing the way people compare and apply for loans. As one of Sweden's fastest-growing FinTech companies, they are dedicated to delivering seamless financial services to over 500,000 customers. Their state-of-the-art cloud platform, powered by microservices and event-driven architecture, is central to their mission of providing the best possible loan deals. As they continue to scale, they are seeking talented individuals to join their innovative tech team.
 



  





**The Role:** 
 The company is seeking an experienced AWS DevOps Engineer to help scale and enhance their cloud infrastructure. In this role, the engineer will play a crucial part in managing and optimizing microservices environments, ensuring robust and efficient operations. Additionally, the engineer will lead efforts to advance networking capabilities and spearhead key architectural initiatives.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Design, deploy, and maintain AWS infrastructure to support the company’s scalable, microservices-based platform.
* Manage and optimize microservices environments, ensuring seamless integration and performance.
* Lead networking initiatives to enhance the reliability and security of the cloud infrastructure.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive continuous improvements in DevOps processes.
* Implement automation and monitoring solutions to ensure high availability and quick recovery.



  





**What the Company Is Looking For:** 



* Extensive experience with AWS services and cloud infrastructure.
* Strong expertise in managing and deploying microservices architecture.
* Solid understanding of basic networking concepts and their application in a cloud environment.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines, automation tools, and infrastructure as code (e.g., Terraform, or other IaC tools).
* A proactive, problem-solving mindset with a passion for innovation and continuous improvement.



  





**Why Apply:** 



* Be part of a company that’s transforming the financial landscape in Sweden.
* Work with a forward-thinking, collaborative team in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid/remote work options—on average, team members work three days from home.
* Competitive salary, benefits, and opportunities for professional growth.



  





**Contact Information:** 
 For any questions, please contact Luqman Mohammed-Brown at L.mohammed-brown@tenthrevolution.com.

title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer (DevOps)
description:
