Meet 
 
 Yubico
 
 : the inventor of the 
 
 YubiKey
 
 ––the world's first and leading security key. Our company’s mission is to make secure login easy and available for everyone. Yubico was founded in 2007 by Stina and Jakob Ehrensvard, and recently went public on Nasdaq First North Growth Market Stockholm: YUBICO. Our customers include Fortune 500 companies, hundreds of government agencies and millions of individuals in over 160 countries that rely on Yubico technology to secure access to computers, online services and mobile apps. We  are a global company with a strong company culture and employees located in over 14 countries. Yubico’s  headquarters are based in  Stockholm, Sweden and Santa Clara, CA.  Aligned with our mission to make the internet more secure for everyone, Yubico donates YubiKeys to organizations helping at-risk individuals through our philanthropic initiative, 
 
 Secure it Forward
 
 .
 








**At Yubico, we offer:** 








**Yubico Values:** 
 We work to ensure that our employees have an open space to have their voices amplified to create a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workplace where everyone feels like they belong. Aligned with this, our employees have created some pretty cool Employee Resource Groups: YubiPride, YubiBIPOC, YubiSustainability and YubiWomen. Additionally, Yubico donates YubiKeys to organizations in need all over the world (you can read more about our work here).
 







**Social Connection:** 
 Relationships and connectedness matter, and we love spending time with our team! Our virtual workspace keeps us connected day-to-day whether it's through Yubico celebrating wins or our buzzing Slack communities. We host an all-team event in a new location every year where we plan for upcoming quarters, set goals, and most importantly, host fun events to encourage team building outside of the workplace. Check out our Life at Yubico Page on LinkedIn and our awards here
 **.** 




  





 The Role:
 







 Your assignment is to create and maintain the foundation and infrastructure for our company to build the next generation of security services.
 







 You will be part of a team located in Sweden and the US. Together we aim to automate everything from CI/CD pipelines to DNS records. If you are looking for a fun challenge, are passionate about usable security, and want to work at a fast-moving company, this opportunity is for you! In this role you will be able to: 
 







 -Work with a wide range of technologies - from hardware to Web services 
 



 -Put infrastructure in place to support the whole company
 



 -Work collaboratively with your team and other engineering teams to solve problems
 








  




**Tasks & Responsibilities:** 
* Ensuring the security, availability, performance, scalability, and automation of our infrastructure
* Work closely with both local and remote teams across the globe
* Ensuring reliable and ongoing measurement and monitoring of our infrastructure
* Maintaining and enhancing build/deployment pipelines for continuous integration and continuous delivery of changes to improve the quality and availability of our products
* Being one of our Infrastructure team’s main contributors establishing new technologies in a broad spectrum, often influencing company-wide infrastructure decisions
* Leading some of the larger and more complex projects, coordinating efforts across multiple teams
* Actively participating in teammates projects (through code reviews, collab-sessions), and mentoring other engineers



  




**Skills & Experience:** 
* 10+ years working with infrastructure/networking
* Experience working with deployment and orchestration technologies (such as Kubernetes, Docker, Ansible, Terraform)
* Proficiency in scripting and programming
* Proficiency in utilizing Infrastructure as code
* Experience running solutions on GCP or AWS






  




  










  





 We are an equal opportunity employer, we value diversity and uphold an inclusive environment where all people feel that they are equally respected and valued. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law. We'd love to learn about what you can add to our diverse team.
 







 Yubico does not accept agency resumes or referrals so please do not send them to our careers staff or employees. Yubico is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes or referrals.
 







 Personal data submitted through this form is used for managing Yubico’s recruitment activities, which include facilitating any application you make, setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing results and selecting candidates, and as otherwise needed in our recruitment and onboarding processes. The use of your personal data may also be necessary prior to entering into a contract with you (that is prior to offering you a job with Yubico). Your personal data will only be used for the purposes for which it was collected and in accordance with the Yubico Privacy Notice. We only keep your personal data for as long as necessary and in compliance with Yubico’s record retention policies. If you have asked us to, we will keep you informed of other opportunities at Yubico. We do this in various ways, including email and by phone. If at any time you do not want us to contact you or use your information as described herein please contact us at jobs@yubico.com to let us know and we will delete all such information. Providing your personal data is voluntary, but necessary to join our talent community, and if you do not agree to provide your data, we will not be able to consider you as part of our talent community.
 







 As part of providing the requested service, we will transfer your data to be processed by Lever, Inc., a service provider contracted by Yubico AB and/or its subsidiaries that meets legally mandated privacy requirements. The Yubico Privacy Notice offers more information about Yubico privacy practices, including the lawful basis for processing of personal data, how to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority, and how to contact Yubico to exercise your data subject rights. In this notice, when we refer to "Yubico", "us", "we" or "our", we mean the Yubico group company or companies that you apply to, or correspond with, and which are responsible for any personal data collected about you.

title: CI/CD Platform Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
 We are looking for a CI/CD Platform Engineer to be part of the Platform Applications team. Product teams in H&M are diverse and span from team developing internal services to those targeting a global customer base of millions. The Platform Applications team specializes in providing tooling, software templates, and solutions to accelerate product teams to deliver value.
   

  

 You should have a continuous improvement mindset seeking to automate and remove cognitive load for our consumers, understanding the use case for CI/CD.
   

  

 You need to be able to use build tools and understand how build tools are used in CI and worked with implementation and maintenance of automated infrastructure solutions.
   

  

 You also need to be able to move around like a fish with containers and deploying to containerized cloud components. Other important things include researching different deployment strategies, CI/CD pipeline optimization. Having worked with development of applications in the past is a must, and more than anything you need to be passionate about CI/CD automation.
   

  

 As a key player within the Platform Applications team, some of your responsibilities will include:
   

  

* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain software templates, assets, and workflows incorporating best technology practices.
* Driving the standardization and reusability of code and components across the organization, aiming to decrease the cognitive load on developers.
* Contributing to the continuous improvement of the developer experience in the full software development lifecycle by identifying pain points, streamlining processes, and implementing innovative solutions.


**Qualifications**
 Experience with DevOps practices and Platform Engineering especially focusing on developing and maintaining efficient Software Development Lifecycle automation templates.
   

  

 These are the tools/technologies we are using on a daily basis:
   

  

* GitHub and GitHub actions
* GIT
* Terraform
* Azure
* Kubernetes
* Helm
* Docker
* At least one programming language.


**Additional Information**
 This is a full-time permanent position, starting as soon as possible according to agreement. The role is an on-site position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Apply by sending in your CV in English as soon as possible. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through the career page. If you have any questions about the role, please contact responsible recruiter Devika Langar at devika.langar@hm.com
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*
**Inclusion & Diversity**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organization. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence, all diversity dimensions are considered in our recruitment process.
   

  

**Company Description**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way.  Learn more about H&M here.

title: Senior Devops engineer
description:
Here's an opportunity for a talented DevOps engineer to join a super well-established and innovative company within the education sector in Stockholm!
 



  





 An international company, with their main tech hub based in Stockholm, they have built a platform & product that allows students to find and connect with the best universities and educational opportunities that suit their skillset, interests, and abilities when it comes to taking their next step!
 



  





 The product is a B2B platform that universities pay for, that allows students (completely free of charge) to connect with both local and international universities and opportunities in different ways, whether they are students looking for the best school locally, nationally or internationally, someone who wants to study abroad for a semester, or student-athletes who are interested and eligible for scholarships - this product can make it happen in an easier way than ever before!

title: Senior DevOps Manager
description:
*KG Knutsson AB Vår vision är att föra människor framåt. Med våra produkter och tjänster tar vi människan framåt på vägen, genom livet, i rusningstrafiken, på semestern eller på jobbet. Vill man göra det lätt för sig säger man att vi med vår e-handelsplats autokatlogen.se säljer reservdelar och tillbehör till bilar, lastbilar, bussar, båtar och arbetsfordon. Det är onekligen en stor del av vår omsättning. Men vi är så mycket mer, vi deltar i omställningen till en fossilfri fordonsflotta med vårt dotterbolag Carsmart, vi strävar mot att skapa en cirkulär ekonomi för de delar av transportbranschen vi verkar i, vi har som mål att genom smarta produkter och tjänster skydda liv på vägarna. Genom hela vår historia har långsiktiga relationer värderats högt och lika så att kunna erbjuda våra kunder produkter med hög kvalitet. Vi har en privat ägare, är cirka 1300 medarbetare och vi finns förutom i Sverige också i Norge, Finland, Estland, Lettland och Litauen.*
 Sammanfattning
   

  

 KGK IT är en koncerngemensam funktion som ansvara för alla KGK’s system på de marknader där KGK har verksamhet.
   

  

 Senior DevOps Manager ansvarar för att säkerställa driften och underhållet av företagets Core IT-infrastruktur och system, inklusive nätverk-, server-, och säkerhetstjänster. Rollen innebär att övervaka, stödja och förbättra driften av olika tekniska plattformar, säkerställa hög tillgänglighet och prestanda samt implementera nya lösningar och uppdateringar.
   

  

 Vidare ingår det att vara med i KGK’s transformation till en ny teknisk infrastruktur primärt hostad i Azure.
   

  

 Ansvarsområden
   

  

**Team lead**
 Du skall ansvara och leda ett internt team som är placerade i Sverige (flera siter) och i Finland. Du kommer att ingå i KGK IT:s ledningsgrupp och ha budgetansvar för gruppen och för IT-driftverksamheten.
   

  

**Nätverksinfrastruktur**
 Design, implementering och underhåll av WAN, LAN och WLAN nätverkslösningar.
   

  

**Server- och klientinfrastruktur**
 Design, implementering och underhåll av serverinfrastruktur, inklusive Azure infrastruktur, fysiska och virtuella servrar.
   

  

 Design, implementering och underhåll av klientinfrastruktur såsom PC och mobila enheter.
   

  

**IT-Säkerhet**
 Hantering av brandväggar och nätverkssäkerhet.
   

  

 Kunskap och erfarenhet av säkerhetsfunktioner och bästa praxis inom Microsoft 365, inklusive:
   

  

 Microsoft Defender
   

  

 Microsoft Intune och Endpoint Management
   

  

 Säkerhets- och efterlevnadscenter i Microsoft 365
   

  

 Entra ID och identitetshantering
   

  

 Skydd av känslig information med hjälp av Microsoft Information Protection
   

  

 Säkerhetskopiering och återställning, hantering av backup-tjänster
   

  

 Säkerställande av regelbundna säkerhetskopior och återställningsprocedurer
   

  

**Övervakning och rapportering**
 Övervakning av IT-system och tjänster.
   

  

 Proaktiv hantering av potentiella problem och säkerställande av kontinuerlig drift.
   

  

 Uppdragets 3 delar:
   

  

* Att vara med och planera, genomföra och följa upp förvaltningsuppdrag
* Att vara en del av 2nd line Support
* Projektresurs


 I tjänsten ingår att bemanna IT-beredskapstjänstgöring
   

  

**Personliga egenskaper och kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig som är en ledare och lagspelare med förmåga att samarbeta effektivt med kollegor och intressenter. Du är flexibel och hjälpsam, och du trivs i en prestigelös miljö där alla bidrar till teamets gemensamma mål. För att lyckas i rollen behöver du vara självgående och kunna ta egna initiativ.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har ett stort intresse för teknik och kontinuerligt håller dig uppdaterad med de senaste trenderna och utvecklingarna inom området. Din förmåga att omvärldsbevaka och applicera ny kunskap är en viktig del av ditt arbete hos oss.
   

  

 Du har också erfarenhet av att arbeta med planeringsboard (tex Jira) för förvaltningsarbete, och du är van vid att strukturera och planera ditt och teamets arbete effektivt. Om du dessutom är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och har en positiv inställning kommer du att passa perfekt in i vårt team.
   

  

**Krav**
 God samarbetsförmåga och erfarenhet av teamarbete i ledande ställning.
   

  

 Flexibel och hjälpsam inställning.
   

  

 Prestigelös med fokus på gemensamma mål.
   

  

 Självgående och initiativrik.
   

  

 Stort tekniskt intresse och förmåga att hålla sig uppdaterad med ny teknologi.
   

  

 Erfarenhet av omvärldsbevakning inom teknikområdet.
   

  

 Vana vid att arbeta med planeringsboard för förvaltningsarbete.
   

  

**Teknologier (urval)**
* Microsoft 365 (inklusive AD/Entra ID, Security, Compliance, Exchange, Teams, Intune, SharePoint)
* Azure Infrastructure such as:
+ Azure VMs
+ Azure storage
+ Azure Service Bus
+ Azure Application Insight
+ Cloudflare CDN

* VMware och Veeam
* Palo Alto Firewall
* Windows Server/Client
* Linux Server
* Pingdom
* Raygun


**Du erbjuds**
* Spännande tjänst: En roll där du får möjlighet att utveckla både företaget och dess medarbetare. Du kommer att ha stor påverkan på vår resa framåt och vara med och skapa strukturer som leder oss in i framtiden
* Innovation: Vi är en av de ledande aktörerna inom fordonsbranschen och arbetar med de senaste teknologierna och lösningarna
* Engagerande Arbetsmiljö: Hos oss värdesätts medarbetarnas idéer och initiativ, och vi erbjuder en dynamisk och stöttande arbetskultur
* Hållbarhet i Fokus: Vi strävar efter att minska vår miljöpåverkan och ser denna roll som central för att nå våra hållbarhetsmål
* Utvecklingsmöjligheter: Vi investerar i våra medarbetares utveckling genom utbildning och karriärmöjligheter
* Trygghet: En stabil arbetsgivare som erbjuder en tillsvidareanställning med inledande provanställning


**Övrig information**
**Start** 
 : Så snart som möjligt med hänsyn till uppsägningstid
   

  

**Omfattning** 
 : Heltid, tillsvidare, vi tillämpar provanställning
   

  

**Placeringsort** 
 : Sollentuna. Arbetet sker hybrid/onsite med ca tre dagar på kontoret per vecka.
   

  

 Vi tillämpar löpande urval vilket gör att tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdagen.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan och möjligheten att välkomna dig till oss på KGK!

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses and engines to a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 Are you ready to elevate your career and become a part of a team that is transforming the way TRATON delivers exceptional software solutions to our customers? We are on the lookout for a Senior DevOps Engineer who is expert in automating infrastructure and enhancing software release strategies to join our dynamic team. You will be working in a hybrid work-setting with exciting and complex software development!
   

  

 Who We Are
   

  

 We are dedicated to an inclusive and diverse workplace. You will join a diverse and competent team with a friendly, helpful and inclusive atmosphere. The team has a common vision of the goals and values, allowing us to take our jobs seriously while having fun at the same time. We care for each other’s personal development to learn, grow and evolve, in order to make our deliveries the best we can produce. Be yourself and reveal your talents!
   

  

 Your Role
   

  

 In your role as a Senior DevOps Engineer, you are an essential contributor to our mission of establishing a world-class developer experience. You will scope, design, and implement developer experience focused on pipeline efficiency and infrastructure for a connected development loop inspired by Platform Engineering. The aim is to enable our engineers to validate and deploy their ideas within 24 hours of conception. Seize this opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and make a significant impact on the industry!
   

  

 You will have the chance to contribute to our “developer platform” and “developer portal” initiatives. These elements are integral to any modern tech organization. You will collaborate with a skilled team to develop and sustain these vital components. You will also contribute to creating pipelines and supporting infrastructure to enable self-service workflows across these capabilities.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Programming experience in Typescript or Python and scripting experience.
* Experience with containerization, Cloud Computing (AWS or Azure preferred), Kubernetes, or Docker.
* Automation and orchestration experience including Terraform, Helm, GitLab CI, ArgoCD.
* Experience in setting up monitoring for infrastructure and applications with tools such as Prometheus, Datadog, OpenTelemetry.
* Experience in configuring and troubleshooting container environments.
* Experience in software release strategies in production environment.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.


 Application
   

  

 Your application should include a CV, personal letter, and grade copies. Ongoing selection and interviews will take place during the application period, the position may be filled before the end of the application period.
   

  

 We use logic and personality tests in our selection process and a background check may be conducted for this position.
   

  

 Welcome to apply!
   

  

 Further information
   

  

 If you would like to learn more about the position please contact Mariette Annergren (Group Manager, EEDCD) at +46855353145.

title: Junior Smart Cloud Engineer till Nordomatic!
description:
Hos Nordomatic är ingen dag den andra lik. Speciellt för dig som gillar förena din fallenhet för människor med ditt intresse för teknik. Du är med och bidrar till säkra och smarta lösningar och arbetet görs primärt från kontoret.
 


  


 Vi söker dig som har god teknisk förståelse, samtidigt som du tycker om att jobba projektbaserat och med människor. Som en bonus får du vara med på tåget att skapa en mer grön och hållbar fastighetsdrift!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Nordomatic Aktiebolag
 



  

**Plats :**
 Johanneshov, Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Teknik
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, långsiktigt
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Hösten 2024
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som Junior Smart Cloud Engineer på Nordomatic är du med och utvecklar den tekniska infrastrukturen på en av samhällets absoluta byggstenar. Här får du chansen att driva affären framåt genom att se över kretsscheman, placera ut symboler inom VVS, samt avlasta teamet. I den här rollen kommer du se över det som levereras till kund och säkerställa att leveransen alltid håller högsta kvalitet.
 


  


 Det finns många utvecklingsmöjligheter för dig som vill växa på en arbetsplats som präglas av öppenhet och högt i tak. Bland annat finns det möjligheter framåt att arbeta med budgethantering, granska och ta emot inkommande handlingar och delta i alla projektfaser.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En långsiktig anställning som anpassar sig efter dina intressen och förmågor
  
* En möjlighet att arbeta nytta för både samhälle och miljö
  
* En konsultchef som är mån om dina intressen och din professionella utveckling
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Följ driftskortsmallar och instruktioner från kund
  
* Rita driftbilder och placera ut symboler
  
* Utföra egenavprovning enligt protokoll
  
* Arbeta i databaser och i projekt
  
* Utföra samordnade avprovning med styrentreprenörer
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Innehar en gymnasieexamen gärna inom datateknik, IT eller fastighetsdrift
  
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska i både tal och skrift
  
* Har en god teknisk förståelse
  
* Innehar B-körkort
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Erfarenhet av att serva och underhålla teknisk utrustning
  
* Kunskap om nätverk och IP-adresser
  
* Erfarenhet från fastighetsbranschen, industriarbete eller som drifttekniker
  


  


 Kunskap kan erhållas genom utbildning, erfarenhet eller att vara självlärd.
 


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* **Social och lättlärd**
 - Du tycker om att jobba med människor och är nyfiken på att lära dig nya saker
  
* **Samarbetsvillig**
 - Trivs med att arbeta i team och ta del av andras arbete
  
* **Strukturerad**
 - Höga krav på noggrannhet och att följa protokoll
  
* **Flexibel och initiativtagande**
 - Att hjälpa till hos andra team i perioder med mindre jobb och alltid vara redo för nya uppgifter
  


  


  

**OBS:**
 Ett utdrag ur belastningsregistret kommer göras på den kandidat som får erbjudande om jobbet.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.

title: Cloud Architect
description:
*Founded in 2018, Kreditz is already the market leader in PSD2 credit scoring products.*
*We use Open Banking/PSD2 technology to create our revolutionizing real-time credit scoring products, which are beloved by banks, financial institutions, gambling companies and many more. Kreditz products enable consumers, and businesses, to gain financial inclusion, and financial opportunity where none would be available with traditional credit scoring systems.*
*Our long-term vision "One world, One score" translates into our everyday mission of financial inclusion, and financial opportunity, for everyone around the globe
   

  

 – Everyone deserves a fair assessment.*
*To fuel our growth to the next level, we recently added 10m EUR of funding from world renown investors Creades and Ingka Investments.*
*Come join us on our impactful mission!*
**About The Position**
 Thanks to a continuous three figure growth (+170% FY22 vs FY21) and ambitious expansion plans we are looking to strengthen our organization further with a
 *Cloud Architect* 
 . We are currently entering an exciting phase (startup to scaleup) and expanding our market presence rapidly in the Nordic countries and in Europe. Our clients range from some of Europe’s largest banks and iGaming companies to smaller, innovative businesses.
   

  

**What Can Kreditz Offer**
* One-way ticket to an amazing growth journey you will never forget – A journey where everyone in the team plays a crucial role for our company’s success
* Fun-loving, passionate, and talented colleagues with whom to share small and big company, and personal, milestones and accomplishments
* Humble corporate culture – we celebrate all wins, no matter the size, together!
* 24/7 access to gym/sauna/sports center at our office PLUS additional wellness allowance
* Fixed salary


**Responsibilities**
 Key responsibilities as Cloud Architect at Kreditz:
   

  

* Design and implement scalable and secure cloud architectures that align with business objectives and requirements.
* Evaluate existing cloud infrastructure and make recommendations for improvement and optimization.
* Develop cloud migration strategies and execute the migration of on-premises systems to the cloud.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define cloud-related requirements and provide technical guidance.
* Ensure the security and compliance of cloud environments, implementing necessary controls and monitoring systems.
* Stay up to date with emerging cloud technologies, trends, and best practices.
* Provide guidance and support to development teams in implementing cloud-native solutions.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to define and prioritize cloud initiatives based on business needs.
* Conduct cost analysis and optimization of cloud resources to maximize efficiency and minimize expenses.


**WE ARE LOOKING FOR**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Cloud Architect to join our IT team at Kreditz. As a Cloud Architect, you will play a critical role in optimizing our cloud services, reducing costs, and improving the performance of our expanding algorithms/logic. You will be responsible for designing and implementing cloud-based solutions, ensuring efficient cloud usage, and staying up to date with industry best practices.
   

  

**Additionally We Believe You Have**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* 3-5 years of experience in Cloud Architect or similar role.
* Proven experience as a Cloud Architect or in a similar role.
* Strong expertise in cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* In-depth knowledge of cloud architecture patterns, best practices, and security frameworks.
* Experience with containerization technologies such as Micro-services, Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes.
* Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools.
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English (verbal and written).
* Knowledge of additional European languages can be meritorious.
* Relevant certifications such as AWS Certified Solutions Architect or Azure Solutions Architect are a plus.
* Experience working with FinTech and PSD2 technologies are a plus.


**APPOINTMENT OF ROLE**
 We interview candidates on an ongoing basis (ongoing selection)
   

  

**SCOPE**
 Fulltime, permanent employment (tillsvidareanställning)
   

  

**SALARY**
 Fixed monthly salary
   

  

**REPORTING**
 You will be reporting to the company’s CTO
   

  

**WORKPLACE**
 Our office is in Danderyd, Stockholm
   

  

**CONTACT**
 Lorenzo Puccio, COO, Lorenzo@kreditz.com
   

  

 For more information about the role feel free to reach out to our CTO arlen@kreditz.com

title: Erfaren testingenjör till ledande bolag inom bygg!
description:
Är du en driven testingenjör med en passion för att säkra integrationer och systemstabilitet? Har du erfarenhet av att arbeta med komplexa testflöden och automatisering, och är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär? Vi söker just nu en teknisk testingenjör som vill spela en central roll i ett spännande projekt hos vår kund. Om du är lösningsorienterad, har stark teknisk kompetens och vill arbeta i en dynamisk miljö, kan detta vara rollen för dig!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vi söker för vår kunds räkning en teknisk testingenjör med erfarenhet av integrationstestning. Du kommer att ha en central roll i projektet där flera system konsolideras till ett nytt system med en ny integrationsplattform. Din expertis inom testning kommer att vara avgörande för att säkerställa att samtliga integrationer fungerar sömlöst och att systemet uppfyller höga krav på prestanda, säkerhet och stabilitet.
 


  


 Vår kund är ett av de ledande byggföretagen i Norden. Som expert på att driva komplexa byggprocesser bidrar de till byggande som har en positiv inverkan på kunderna och på samhällets utveckling i stort. Verksamheten omfattar bygg- och infrastrukturprojekt, produktion av asfalt och stenmaterial samt kommersiell fastighetsutveckling. Uppdraget är initialt på 6 månader, men det finns goda chanser till förlängning. Med andra ord letar vi efter dig som är ute efter en långsiktig utmaning!
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Uppdrag på ett stort och välkänt bolag som skapar värde i många delar av vårt samhälle
  
* Arbete i ett kompetent och dedikerat team som brinner för sitt arbete och sin bransch
  
* En konsultchef från Academic Work som följer din resa hos företaget
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Utföra integrationstestning mellan system, inklusive API-testning för att säkerställa dataintegritet och korrekt felhantering.
  
* Scripting och automatisering av testflöden med Python, inklusive autentisering och dataskydd.
  
* Bygga och administrera testpipelines i Azure DevOps.
  
* Säkerställa att testmiljön är redo och att nödvändiga testdata finns tillgängliga för olika scenarier.
  
* Design och underhåll av testscenarier
  
* Fungera som en länk mellan superanvändare, servicemanager och integrationsledare för effektiv kommunikation och problemlösning.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har erfarenhet av testutveckling och testautomatisering.
  
* Har erfarenhet av Python och andra utvecklingsspråk.
  
* Har god förståelse för arkitektur och testmetodologier
  
* Har erfarenhet av API-testning, verifiering av endpoints, dataintegritet, felhantering, prestanda och säkerhet
  
* Har erfarenhet av att implementera och testa säkerhetsåtgärder för API, såsom autentisering, auktorisering och dataskydd
  
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta med Postman och andra testverktyg
  
* Har erfarenhet av att administrera testmiljöer, koordinera användartester och säkerställa kravtäckning
  
* Har erfarenhet av att testa stora mängder datapunkter och regressionstestning
  
* Har erfarenhet av koordinering med tekniska och icke-tekniska intressenter
  
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* God samarbetsförmåga, trivs att arbeta både i team och självständigt
  
* Snabblärd med en lösningsorienterad inställning
  
* Lagspelare med en "doer" mentalitet

Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. title: Systemutvecklare/ Fullstacksutvecklare
description:
*Redpill Linpro är ledande specialister inom systemutveckling baserat på open source och brinner för öppna lösningar, öppna affärsmodeller och ett öppet samhälle. Tillsammans samverkar vi för att uppnå maximal nytta för alla. Hos oss finns några av marknadens främsta experter inom sina specialområden. Vi är drygt 320 anställda och du finner oss i tre länder på sju kontor: Stockholm, Göteborg, Karlstad, Linköping samt i Köpenhamn, Oslo och Trondheim.*
**Arbetsbeskrivning**
 Nu utökar vi vårt område specialiserat på systemutveckling och vill hitta fler kollegor som brinner för att arbeta med relevant teknik och leverera mjukvarulösningar I världsklass till våra kunder! Du kommer arbeta i tätt samarbete med kund för att arbeta fram den bästa lösningen på problem och tackla utmaningar med innovativa tekniska lösningar. Vi arbetar med flera branscher där du får ta del av stora enterpriseprojekt till mindre start-ups.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
* Du är en ambitiös engagerad utvecklare/arkitekt med erfarenhet av modern Fullstack-utveckling
* Du tycker om att interagera med kunder, kollegor och användare för att diskuterahur man bäst löser problem och utmaningar med innovativa tekniska lösningar
* Du är noggrann på detaljnivå i både kodning och dokumentation och brinner för Clean Code
* Du är självständig, tar ansvar för att hålla deadlines och leverera högsta kvalitet.


**Kvalifikationer**
 För att trivas som konsult hos oss är det viktigt att du har ett stort teknikintresse och en vilja att utvecklas inom nya områden och i ny teknik. Du drivs av problemlösning och förstår att det är samarbete som för oss framåt. Du tycker också att det är viktigt att hjälpa till att skapa en riktigt bra arbetsplats genom att både driva och delta på sociala aktiviteter samt dela med dig av dina kunskaper till kollegor.
   

  

*Utöver ovanstående kompetenser ser vi gärna att du har:*
* Minst 5 års professionell erfarenhet av systemutveckling med Javascript/TypeScript, Java eller liknande – Gärna på ramverk såsom Spring Boot, Node.js, React och Angular
* Kunskaper i Microservices och containerteknik
* Erfarenhet av cloud
* Praktisk erfarenhet av teamarbete (Scrumerfarenhet är ett plus)
* Bekväm med svenska och engelska


**Varför Redpill Linpro?**
* Du får arbeta med några av de allra mest begåvade IT-talangerna i en organisation som brinner för professionella Open Source-ideal
* Du får arbeta med spännande projekt i flera olika branscher: allt från startups till globala jättar och myndigheter där du får vara med och göra skillnad på riktigt!
* Du får trevliga chefer som för en bra personalpolitik - våra konsulter är våra superstars och prioriteras alltid först
* Du får arbeta med den senaste tech-stacken och alltid vara up-to-date med ny teknologi
* Du får ta del av fördelarna att arbeta på ett medelstort nordiskt bolag med fantastisk sammanhållning, bra förmåner och där du ges stor frihet och flexibilitet i ditt arbete


 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du vill arbeta med oss. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Redpill Linpro is the leading provider of Open Source services and products in the Nordics. We are located in Oslo, Stockholm, Gothenburg, Karlstad Linköping, Copenhagen, Aarhus, and Trondheim with a mission to share knowledge and best practices for a more open society.
   

  

 We are passionate about open solutions, open business models, and an open society where we work together for maximum benefit to everyone. We have got some really skilled co-workers here at Redpill Linpro, particularly within our main areas: API management, development, IT operations, data analytics, customer experience, cloud, DevOps, and automation.
   

  

**May the Source be with you!**

title: Välkänt IoT bolag söker Data Engineer
description:
Ett ledande, skandinaviskt företag inom IoT-tjänster med över 20 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med företag världen över söker dig som drivs av komplex datahantering och arbetat med stora dataflöden.
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Ett ledande, skandinaviskt företag inom IoT-tjänster med över 20 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med företag världen över.
   

 Detta företag är en global ledare inom IoT och hanterar mer än 20 miljoner uppkopplingar för multinationella kunder som Volvo, Scania, Hitachi, Verisure Securitas Direct och Husqvarna. De erbjuder enkel och tillförlitlig tillgång till varje marknad i världen och möjliggör för branschledande aktörer att koppla upp sina produkter och tjänster på global skala över alla vertikaler.
   

 Företaget är rankat topp tre bästa IoT-operatörerna i Europa och bland de tio bästa i världen. Med huvudkontor och tekniskt centrum beläget i Norden har de försäljningsrepresentation i Storbritannien, USA, Tyskland, Italien, Sydafrika, Sydkorea, Kina, Taiwan och Japan.
 


  

  

**Tjänsten och teamet**
  


 De söker en erfaren Data Engineer med utmärkta färdigheter inom avancerad och modern databehandling av stora volymer och hastigheter för att gå med i deras team.
   

 I denna position är teamet ansvarigt för:
 


  

  
* Arkitektur och utveckling av deras dataplattform, inklusive insamling, bearbetning och förberedelse av data – både batch och realtidsdata.
  
* Utveckling av analysrapporter och verktyg.
  
* Utveckling och hantering av ML-modeller.
  
* Piloter och implementering av AI-användningsfall i produktion.
  
* Teamet har också ett DevOps-ansvar vilket innebär att "det vi bygger, det driver vi också".
   

 Datateamet interagerar och levererar affärsvärde till nästan alla delar av organisationen. Teamet är också ansvarigt för att leverera direkt kundvärde, antingen genom att stödja kundnära kollegor eller via kundnära datalösningar.
   

 Detta är en fantastisk möjlighet att bli en del av ett moget och effektivt datateam med stor exponering mot den globala verksamheten.
   

 Denna roll rapporterar till Head of Data (Data Science and Analytics team) och är placerad i Stockholm, Karlskrona eller Göteborg.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**

 För att lyckas i denna position ska man ha omfattande erfarenhet och färdigheter inom:
 


  

  
* Big data
  
* Utveckling inom Python eller Java
  
* Molnutveckling / Dev-ops
  


  

  

**Andra krav**
  

  
* MSc i mjukvaru-/dataingenjör eller liknande
  
* Utmärkta skriftliga och muntliga kommunikationsfärdigheter på engelska och helst svenska
   

  

**Meriterande teknologier / frameworks**
  
* Big data teknologier som: Apache-frameworks (Iceberg, Flink, PySpark, etc)
  
* AWS services som: Glue, StepFunctions, Athen/Trino
  
* Verktyg för dataanalys/ML/AI: Pandas, etc
   

  

**Meriterande arbetsmetoder**
  
* CI/CD designmönster
  
* Dataorienterade testfall
  
* Hantering av referensdata
  
* Distribuerade arbetsbelastningar inklusive partitionsstrategier
  
* Skalbara databehandlingsmönster
   

 Stor vikt läggs vid erfarenhet av att hantera höga och växande datavolymer. Om man har varit en del av ett team som stött på skalningsproblem och löst det på ett innovativt sätt är man en bra kandidat. Kandidater bör också vara kunniga inom säker design och åtkomstmönster, och helst ha en AWS-certifiering.
  


  

  

**Som person**
  


 De söker en engagerad och självdriven person med en positiv och optimistisk inställning. Man ska inte vara rädd för att ta stort ansvar, vara affärsorienterad och bra med människor. Man ska älska att dela tekniskt kunnande och god praxis. Teamet delar en testdriven inställning och ett gemensamt intresse för att arbeta över flera miljöer och programmeringsspråk, utnyttjande av molnets krafter.
   

 Kunskap kan erhållas genom utbildning, erfarenhet eller att vara självlärd.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. title: Cloud Security Sales Specialist - Nordics
description:
Why Join Us?
   

  

 You will join an exciting and high growth business unit with Check Point, positioning the industry’s most comprehensive cloud native security platform, with the industry’s broadest security and compliance coverage for applications, data, and the entire cloud native technology stack throughout the development lifecycle and across hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
   

  

 In this role, you will be responsible for managing a territory and driving the sales for our CloudGuard security solutions, into new and existing customers.
   

  

 It is expected that you deliver or exceed your sales targets in both new business and renewals for ACV and TCV bookings.
   

  

 The role expects you to define your territory, strategies and then lead local execution and in alignment to company strategies and tactics with its Cloud Provider partnerships including, but not limited to, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Accenture and IBM.
   

  

 We are looking for individuals who are excited to share in what is a high energy start-up mentality within a secure and successful $2bn organization.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Win new logos and expand business within your assigned list of target accounts.
* Achieve ACV sales quotas on a monthly and quarterly basis.
* Generate and maintain a 4 rolling quarter pipeline.
* Present regular/accurate forecasting for review.
* Track and report on all opportunities, pipelines, and bookings to provide forecast reports to region management.
* Engage with the local Cloud Provider (AWS, Azure, and Google) sales programs and joint activities.
* Develop, share, and implement standard methodologies and account strategies to increase our sales penetration of Cloud Security into your top accounts.
* Engage with customers to identify and progress opportunities whilst delivering subject matter expertise on Cloud & Cloud Native Security solutions.
* Qualify and progress leads and opportunities through the sales cycle to closure.
* Keep up-to-date knowledge of Cloud Computing, DevOps & Cloud Native technologies as well as the competitive position of the company.
* Gather “Voice of Customer” and competitive intelligence and share with theatre and global Cloud organisation.


**Qualifications**
* 5+ years’ experience in sales.
* A hunter mentality with the drive to win new logo accounts and upsell to existing accounts.
* An understanding of working in a matrix business, selling directly, through, and with the overall assigned account manager.
* Sales excellence; ability to demonstrate planning, strategy, qualification, and execution.
* Deep understanding of Public Cloud and the uniqueness of public cloud architectures.
* Prior experience selling SAAS or Cloud solutions.
* Existing relationships within one or all Public Cloud Providers (AWS, Azure, Google) is preferred.
* A strong understanding of DevOps, containers/Kubernetes, CI/CD, and the cloud native technology ecosystem.
* Excellent communication skills including strong verbal and written skills and proven presentation skills being able to articulate complex topics.
* Experience with target account selling, solution selling, and consultative sales techniques.

title: Lead Developer – Tech Lab
description:
At If, we believe that research, development, and experimentation are excellent ways to gain experience and learn firsthand how to utilize technology to create better services for our customers and explore new business opportunities. We also recognize that it is challenging for every team across our 1,100 people strong IT organization to dedicate their resources to exploring some of the more radical ideas.
   

  

**About Tech Lab**
 Tech Lab is our internal research and development team. We are a small team of engineers with dedicated capacity to work with innovative ideas sourced from all areas of our organization. We research to find answers, create proof-of-concepts to explore viability, and join forces with other teams to build novel solutions for production use. More importantly, we work as a catalyst for innovation in the company through collaboration and knowledge sharing. Our team is passionate, diverse, and driven by curiosity. We believe that different perspectives boost innovation and strengthen our working culture.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a person with strong software development skills and ample experience combined with a true interest in sharing knowledge with others, a great cross-team collaboration facilitator with a pragmatic mindset – someone who is proactive and knows what it takes for a team to get things done and have fun along the way.
   

  

**Key responsibilities** 
**include:**
* implementing ideas in code with your fellow teammates.
* designing solution architecture.
* facilitating ways of working within our own team and in new project constellations.
* collaborating with different stakeholders across the organization.


 Technology Stack
   

  

 The tech stack you would be working with is whatever the team finds best suited to solve the problem at hand. With that being said, some tech is more common than others at If, so proven experience in the following areas will be favorable:
   

  

* Azure Cloud and everything that comes with it, from Infrastructure-as-Code to optimization and monitoring.
* Azure DevOps and Git for CI/CD and Application Lifecycle Management.
* C# / .NET development.
* Web development with JS/TS and modern front-end frameworks.
* Python & Databricks.


 More importantly, you should be open to learning and adopting new technologies and probably consider yourself more of a generalist than a specialist.
   

  

 Who are you?
   

  

 To succeed in this role, we think you are curious with a solution-oriented mindset – not afraid to try and learn new things. We also love having discussions and figuring out things together; therefore, we value a collaborative team mentality with a willingness to share knowledge and be open to giving and receiving feedback on work. Lastly, you should feel comfortable working in different team setups since we collaborate with many different teams across If.
   

  

 This is a senior position, and you should have at least 5 years of professional software development experience and a bachelor’s degree (or higher) in a relevant field of study. Equivalent experience can substitute for the lack of an academic degree. If is a Nordic and Baltic company, thus the working language is English. Additionally, proficiency in a Nordic language is favorable.
   

  

 Hybrid work
   

  

 We apply a hybrid work approach. You are welcome in the office anytime, of course, but at a minimum, you should be prepared to come in a couple of days per week when a collaborative setting is more beneficial (like whiteboard sessions, pair programming, etc.). We adapt to the current initiative we are working on; some projects do require more physical presence than others.
   

  

**Additional Facts**
**Application deadline:** 
 Candidate selection and interviews will be done continuously until the position is filled.
   

  

**To apply for this position:** 
 Please attach your CV and answer the questions in the following steps in the recruiting system
   

**Work location:** 
 Bergshamra/Stockholm
   

  

**Start:** 
 As soon as possible/by agreement.
   

  

 For more information, please contact Elin Hellenius, Talent Acquisition Partner, elin.hellenius@if.se
   

  

 Final candidates will undergo a background check before a job offer can be presented. In addition to references, candidates can also be checked via the internet and social media.
   

  

**About Us**
  

***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.**
 To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.
   

  

 We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.
   

  

 Come and join us!*

title: Tjänsteområdesansvarig Nät- och datakommunikation
description:
Har du samordningsförmåga och gillar att vara i händelsernas centrum? Värnar du om att de tjänster som du ansvarar för motsvarar verksamhetens behov? Har du viljan och förmågan att ständigt lära nytt och utveckla verksamheten och dig själv? Vill du arbeta i en organisation som är i stor tillväxt med syfte att bidra till att göra Sverige och världen säkrare? Då kan du vara den vi söker.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter** 
 I din roll som tjänsteområdesansvarig för nät- och datakommunikation så arbetar du övergripande för att eftersträva säkra, robusta och ändamålsenliga tjänster. Du arbetsleder tjänsteansvariga och IT-specialister inom tjänsteområdet och säkerställer att aktiviteter och leveranser genomförs enligt plan.
   

  

 Du genomför dialog med verksamheten och externa leverantörer för att säkerställa att tjänsteområdet uppfyller befintliga och framtida behov.
   

  

 Du samverkar med övriga tjänsteområdesansvariga och säkerställer att det finns aktuella förvaltningsplaner och att budget framställs och följs upp inom tjänsteområdet.
   

  

 Tjänsten är placerad i Stockholm.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som** 
 Du har gymnasiekompetens, IT-teknisk kompetens och nät- och datakommunikationskompetens alternativt kompetens och utbildning som FMV bedömer likvärdig och värdefull för tjänsten. Du har en god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på både svenska och engelska.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen som tjänsteområdesansvarig för nät- och datakommunikation har du minst två års erfarenhet av motsvarande eller liknande arbete som förvaltningsledare eller tjänsteområdesansvarig. Du har kunskap och erfarenhet av arbetsledning och arbete med förvaltningsplaner och budget.
   

  

 Du är initiativtagande och kan engagera och motivera medarbetare och funktioner för att uppnå resultat. Du är i grunden strukturerad och har helhetssyn men du är också flexibel och ser möjligheter vid ändrade förutsättningar.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har kunskap och erfarenhet av förvaltningsstyrning enligt PM3, ITIL 4 och DevOps.
   

  

 Vi utgår från att du har en vilja och förmåga att lära och utvecklas och du har därför goda möjligheter till kompetensutveckling hos oss.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Om oss** 
 Välkommen till Försvarets materielverk! Vi befinner oss just nu i en spännande tid. Som myndighet i försvarssektorn är vårt uppdrag att leverera det som vårt svenska försvar behöver, viktigare än någonsin. Vi söker därför efter dig, som tillsammans med avdelningens medarbetare och våra samarbetspartners, vill bidra till att göra Sverige och världen säkrare.
   

  

 Infrastrukturstaben ansvarar för myndighetens IT-verksamhet, informationsförvaltning och fastighetsförvaltning.
   

  

 Avdelningen IT drift och infrastruktur söker nu en Tjänsteområdesansvarig Nät- och datakommunikation.
   

  

**FMV – Försvarets materielverk**
 På FMV är du med och bidrar till att göra Sverige och världen säkrare. Vi upphandlar, utvecklar och levererar materiel och tjänster till det svenska försvaret. I vår vision ”Rätt materiel för ett starkare försvar” ryms vårt arbete och våra leveranser till Försvarsmakten av allt från helikoptrar, ubåtar, stridsflygplan och snörade kängor till kompasser, radarstationer, pansarterrängbilar och kuddar. Bredden i vårt uppdrag ger dig möjligheten att jobba med spännande innehåll, människor och projekt. Vi sätter värde på ömsesidigt förtroende och på ett hållbart arbetsliv. Därför erbjuder vi alla våra anställda ett brett utbud av utbildningar, kompetensutveckling och träning.
   

  

**Vill du vara med och utveckla framtidens försvar?** 
 Sök tjänsten via FMV:s webbplats. Vi vill ha dina ansökningshandlingar med personligt brev och CV på svenska. Våra fackliga företrädare är Stefan Hållander SACO-S, Lena Sköld Gunnarsson OFR/S, Lars Mörrby OFR/O och Peter Andersson SEKO. Alla nås på telefon 08-782 40 00 (FMV Växel).
   

  

 Vid frågor om tjänsten ber vi dig kontakta rekryterande chef Niclas Holmkvist via niclas.holmkvist@fmv.se
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag är 2024-09-26.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan.**
 FMV finns för landet, i många delar av landet. Som medarbetare hos oss får du både en trygg och utmanande anställning och ett stort eget ansvar. För att jobba hos oss behöver du vara svensk medborgare och genomgå en säkerhetsprövning, i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen. Vi tillämpar provanställning och som anställd kommer du att krigsplaceras utifrån totalförsvarets behov. Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via FMV:s webbplats eller via vår registratur. Vi har redan gjort vårt medieval, därför undanber vi oss samtal från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.

title: Fullstack Developer, Solna
description:
We seek to strengthen our position and increase the speed of exploration in PostNord Group IT. We are looking for a Fullstack Developer who will play an important role in our advancement of rapid prototyping capabilities. We offer you an open and inclusive work environment, with very competent colleagues as well as good benefits. Apply now to the Fullstack Developer role!
   

  

**Join us**
 The Technology Acceleration area within Group IT is responsible for exploring the future IT landscape and create prototypes and MVP’s that will be the foundation for PostNord's digital journey.
   

  

 As a Fullstack developer you will be a part of our newly founded concept development team. The concept development team will refine needs or hypotheses into a concrete concept and assess feasibility and market viability of the proposed concept before delivering a working prototype, proving or disproving a hypothesis.
   

  

**Job Duties**
* Work closely with other business stakeholders, designers, product owners, and other developers within PostNord to ensure concepts contribute to and draw from a holistic company perspective.
* Contribute to the product development in PostNord through the development of prototypes
* Partcipate and guide colleagues and stakeholders in interactive and creative problem-solving sessions.


**Your profile as a Fullstack Developer**
 You are curious and like to ask the question why – more than once – to understand the needs of your stakeholders rather than their more direct wishes. You like to work hands on and facilitate workshops and discussions, and to work directly with our business stakeholders.
   

  

 As a person you are eager to learn and evolve your skill set in accordance with the state-of-the-art pace in the domain that you work in. The drive to do this comes from understanding the business and deliver the best possible value, where you see technology as the means and not the goal.
   

  

 In a setting where everything is new, you are comfortable discovering the way as you go without detailed instructions, but also in turning your explorative findings into structure and order that can be re-applied in similar situations in the future.
   

  

**We Are Looking For You Who Have**
* Academic education in computer science or equivalent experience.
* At least 5 years relevant working experience.
* Worked with agile working methods and according to DevOps principles.
* Extensive experience developing IT solutions, being part of design, architecture, requirements, development, testing, and deployment to production. Having done this in Azure environment is a plus.
* Experience in frontend development (React, Typescript and Next.js or similar) and backend development with .Net (preferred) or JAVA.
* You have worked in cross functional teams with agile working methods and according to DevOps principles.


**Meritorious experience: (Nice-to-have)**
* Familiarity with modern data platforms. ADF and Databricks is a plus. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps,
* Have used prototypes and MVP’s to iterate and enhance new solutions.
* Worked with data heavy solutions, or has worked in a data scientist role before.
* Basic data analysis- and data visualization skills in tools such as Power BI, Tableau, or D3.js.
* Basic understanding of ML and statistical models


**Language requirement:**
 Fluent English in speech and writing. Proficiency in at least one Scandinavian language is meritorious.
   

  

**We offer you**
**Benefits**
 We offer you a flexible hybrid workplace with a prestige-free environment where we as a team help each other to reach our goals. We encourage self-sufficient leadership for development and career opportunities. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Work in a Nordic/International and flexible environment.
* Good insurance and occupational pension conditions
* Wellness allowance & access to office gym and swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord's own employee foundation PostNord Plus
* Employment according to a collective agreement.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region.
   

  

 We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com
   

  

**Apply**
 We look forward to receiving your application! If you have any questions or concerns, you are welcome to contact Christian Mejlvang, Christian.mejlvang@postnord.com
   

  

 Click here for union contact

title: Data Architect
description:
* Full Time
* Kista, Stockholm, Sweden
* Posted 2 years ago
* Applications have closed
* Work Visa Required

  


CosMicIT
**CosMic IT**
*Find Your Dream Job Here*
Greetings #Everyone,

We at #CosMicIT GmbH are looking for a Data Architect

Locations- #Kista #Stockholm #Sweden  

Language: #English  

Role type: Contract (6 months)

JOB DESCRIPTION –  

Mandatory Skills:  

Experience in Data & Analytics work – Data Warehousing, ETL, Visualization, Collaboration, Platforms  

Knowledge, experience and skills in the required technologies for the project / assignment – this includes several Cloud tools and technologies  

Knowledge, experience and skills in the required data domains

Years of exp needed – 14+ Years

Identify the enterprise data needs, design and maintain the data assets to meet the customer needs. Further, use master blueprints to guide data integration, data flows, data assets management and align data modelling. Develop strategy to evolve data products and services with the purpose to achieve data consistency and performance across the analytics/data solutions. Support data management with e.g., data governance, storage and operations.  

Design plans to meet current and long-term data requirements  

Establish Data Architecture – evaluate existing data architecture specifications and develop a roadmap for the future  

Design end to end Data Architectures taking both specific business needs and our enterprise blueprints in to account to make sure we have efficient reuse and operations

(a) Outline of Strategic Data Requirements (b) Data Architecture Design and Integration Design to meet the requirements (c) Data Flow Design (d) Data Models (e) Data Value Chains (f) Support (and use) with Standard Business Vocabulary for data and components (g) Alignment with Enterprise Architecture and Enterprise Data Model and Reference Data Model (h) Implementation Roadmap for all data in scope

If any of these openings sound familiar to you or any of your known networks, please share the resume/CV to CV@cosmic-it.com

title: ISV Partner Solution Sales
description:
The Global Partner Solutions (GPS) team is a sales organization accountable for the commercial partner business at Microsoft, and the mission is to build and sell Microsoft Cloud applications, services and devices with partners, empowering people, and organizations to achieve more.  

As a Partner Solution Sales (PSS) for ISVs, we are looking for you to bring your work ethic, enthusiasm, optimism, and passion for the customer to foster growth and change within our partner ecosystem.
You will leverage your challenger mindset, sales management skills, technology, and industry knowledge, and best in class interpersonal abilities to enable our partners to bring market-defining solutions to our customers.
This job opportunity will allow you to accelerate your career growth as you work with highly complex partner organizations, build strong relationships with partner and Microsoft sales organizations and collaborate across multiple stakeholders to accelerate sales performance,**Responsibilities**
--------------------


In the Partner Solution Sales for ISVs role;* You will collaborate with segment sellers and other internal stakeholders on partner co-selling efforts with a portfolio of assigned ISV partners to drive sales pipeline.
* You will develop and execute co-sell strategies that outline activities and expectations that drive Microsoft and partner sales targets and lead collaboration between internal and external stakeholders to accelerate deal execution, leverage investments, and accelerate sales.
* You will track cloud solution area co-sell pipeline performance and independently addresses low performance through correction of errors (CoE) efforts as well as track partner sales capabilities and capacities for sales practice acceleration and growth and incentive utilization and impact on pipeline velocity and provides recommendations to partner to improve performance while also tracking quarterly forecast to ensure it meets and/or exceeds revenue accountability.
* You will manage top partner deals and overall partner revenue and closely collaborate with other partner facing resources across the GPS organization.
* You will share best practices for co-selling with partners and global peers through community forums, contributes to listening circles and contributes to worldwide learning initiatives as a subject matter expert and share market local solution area business momentum insights and corporate research for customer demand.

**Qualifications**
------------------

* Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (e.g., Informatics), Business/Economics (Sales), or related field;
* Proven experience in information technology (IT)-related industry sales, the partner channel sales and professional coaching/mentoring - OR equivalent experience;
* This role requires proficiency in written, reading, and conversational Swedish as you will be assigned to the Swedish Customer Market.

  


Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: Data Scientist
description:
**For our client in the automotive industry we’re looking for a Data Scientist. Our client is looking for an experienced Data Scientist to provide support in two ongoing projects. The work will involve method development and exploratory analysis, as well as deployment in a cloud environment using microservices. The projects utilize techniques such as geographic clustering, outlier detection, advanced data aggregation, and packaging for interactive visualization. The productionalization will be done in close collaboration with development teams, Data Engineers, and Data Analysts with deep PowerBI expertise. You will work alongside other Data Scientists responsible for the delivery in the projects.**


### **Required Skills**


* Exploratory data analysis, method development, and data visualization in Python. Experience in analyzing positional data is advantageous.
* Automation of data analysis pipelines and deployment in a cloud environment. Experience with AWS and Databricks is advantageous.
* Effective communication with stakeholders and various technical roles within data and IT.

title: Back End Engineer
description:
**Our client is seeking a collaborative and curious Back End Engineer to help drive and develop our CI infrastructure forward. Continuous Integration (CI) is at the core of our clients’ developer experience. This role will be part of a team collaboratively creating and owning their CI infrastructure for our client which aims to provide their developers with a streamlined, simple to use and safe build experience at scale.** **The role is located in the Platform Developer Experience (PDX) studio within the Platform Mission. The PDX Studio oversees and owns the infrastructure that cuts across all engineering disciplines.**


### **Assignment Description**


* Execute future CI infrastructure strategy that is able to serve engineers.
* Support with Operational tasks keeping our client’s systems healthy and up to date.
* Drive the automation and improvements of the client’s CI system across their current technical stacks.
* Help scale our client’s CI infrastructure to support large-scale.
* Collaborate with Infrastructure teams across the company to discover what a best in class CI infrastructure means.

  


**Requirements**


* You are an experienced engineering familiar with Linux, MacOS, and Windows as well as Networking fundamentals.
* You are an experienced Software Engineer with Java and Python.
* You have experience deploying to and implementing solutions in GCP, Azure, and/or AWS.
* You believe in iteration and know that finding the right solution is more important than the first.
* You like to focus on standardization and automation always looking for ways to improve the developer experience.
* Experience in building and implementing large-scale systems across various projects and teams.
* You have familiarity with and enthusiasm for software engineering best practices such as testing, continuous integration, and continuous delivery.

  


**Required Skills**


* Linux, MacOS, and Windows system administration experience.
* HTTP / networking.
* Google Cloud (preferred) / Azure / AWS.
* Teamcity Integrations.
* Ansible.
* Java.
* Python.
* Docker.

SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.

title: Consultant, Principal
description:
General information
Country
Sweden


City
Malmo


Job ID
39835


Department
Infor Consulting Services


Experience Level
MID\_SENIOR\_LEVEL


Employment Status
FULL\_TIME


Workplace Type
Hybrid


Description & Requirements  

  

In the role of principal business consultant, you work with customers to implement our CloudSuite Food & Beverage (or other industry segments) and industry-standard processes from the sales phase into the delivery phase of the project. While our technology is an enabler for the customer to achieve business benefits, the industry knowledge and experience of our consultants is the key to success. We work in both national and international projects and you will be working in motivating environments with prestigious companies. The role requires travel but during these times it’s hard to define.  

A Day in The Life Typically Includes:* Conduct business process walk through to determine all client process and data needs to address in project scope.
* Design solution to align client business needs with standard CloudSuite application capabilities and our Implementation accelerators.
* Work on complex issues where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.
* Build/configure solution based on design, using iterations of prototypes, and testing to validate the solution.
* Act as subject matter expert for applications to support Project Manager, technical resources, and other members of project team


What You Will Need:
We believe that you thrive in an environment where you feel empowered, trusted, and challenged. You are self-motivated with a curious mindset, passionate for develop our customers business and hitting results. You are a great communicator with a humble attitude.  

 Basic Qualifications:  

* Industry Knowledge within Food & Beverage (or other industry segments: Distribution, Manufacturing or Equipment)
* 10+ years’ project experience of implementing Infor M3 or similar ERP Software.
* Experience in implementing business systems - from the sales phase to project completion.
* Business process knowledge within Supply Chain
* Be able to communicate in speech and writing in both English and Swedish
* Bachelor’s degree
  

Preferred Qualifications:  

* Thrive in an environment where you feel empowered, trusted, and challenged.
* Self-motivated with a curious mindset, passionate for develop our customers business and hitting results.
* A great communicator, oral and written, with a humble attitude.
* Customer-facing consulting experienced.
* Reliability and deadline-driven approach
* Strong organizational skills & time management skills
* Experience of implementing Infor CloudSuite. Other ERP systems are also meritorious e.g., SAP, Oracle, Microsoft, Jeeves, IFS, Visma or similar systems.
* Familiarity with BI and combination with Infor’s CloudSuite.
  


  

About Infor  

Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.
For more information visit www.infor.com  


Our Values  

At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization. Increasing diversity is important to reflect our markets, customers, partners, and communities we serve in now and in the future.  

We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.  

Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the FAQ section at the bottom of the infor.com/about/careers webpage.

title: Enterprise Account Executive - Sweden
description:
Sweden
Harness is a high-growth company that is disrupting the software delivery market. Our mission is to enable the 30 million software developers in the world to deliver code to their users reliably, efficiently, securely and quickly, increasing customers’ pace of innovation while improving the developer experience. We offer solutions for every step of the software delivery lifecycle to build, test, secure, deploy and manage reliability, feature flags and cloud costs. The Harness Software Delivery Platform includes modules for CI, CD, Cloud Cost Management, Feature Flags, Service Reliability Management, Security Testing Orchestration, Chaos Engineering, Software Engineering Insights and continues to expand at an incredibly fast pace.

Harness is led by technologist and entrepreneur Jyoti Bansal, who founded AppDynamics and sold it to Cisco for $3.7B. We’re backed with $425M in venture financing from top-tier VC and strategic firms, including J.P. Morgan, Capital One Ventures, Citi Ventures, ServiceNow, Splunk Ventures, Norwest Venture Partners, Adage Capital Partners, Balyasny Asset Management, Gaingels, Harmonic Growth Partners, Menlo Ventures, IVP, Unusual Ventures, GV (formerly Google Ventures), Alkeon Capital, Battery Ventures, Sorenson Capital, Thomvest Ventures and Silicon Valley Bank.
**POSITION SUMMARY**

  


Harness is looking for sales champions and leaders who are as passionate about building the next great software company as they are about blowing out their numbers every quarter.

**ABOUT THE ROLE**


* Exceeding your number- Winning new enterprise logos
* Forecasting correctly, communicating clearly, aligning brilliantly with the rest of the team
* Not being afraid of being data driven - including using Salesforce and other tools to track your progress
* Managing full sales cycle from prospect to close
* Collaborating with other teams, including sales engineering and sales development
**ABOUT YOU**


* A proven track record of driving and closing enterprise deals
* Account planning and execution skills
* Ability to sell C-Level and across both IT and business units
* Consistent overachievement of quota and revenue goals with a strong W2 track record
* Understands the value of utilizing a strong sales methodology such as MEDDPIC when building pipeline and qualifying opportunities
* Proven consultative sales solution skills, including the ability to articulate a clear, concise return on investment value statement
* Ability to maintain a high level of productivity, manage multiple competing priorities, and work effectively under the pressure of time constraints in a fast-paced, complex, collaborative, and team-oriented environment
* Bachelors Degree or equivalent
### **Work Location**



The role will be Remote in Sweden.


### **What you will have at Harness**


* Competitive salary
* Comprehensive healthcare benefits
* Flexible work schedule
* Monthly, quarterly, and annual social and team building events
* Monthly internet reimbursement
